See H2TLSWarmUpSize for a description of TLS warmup. H2TLSCoolDownSecs reflects the fact that connections may deteriorate over time (and TCP flow adjusts) for idle connections as well. It is beneficial to overall performance to fall back to the pre-warmup phase after a number of seconds that no data has been sent.
trans-unit.target: 有关TLS预热的说明，请参见 H2TLSWarmUpSize 。 H2TLSCoolDownSecs 反映了这样一个事实，即对于空闲连接，连接也可能随时间恶化（并且TCP流量会调整）。在几秒钟之内没有发送任何数据之后，退回到预热阶段对整体性能是有益的。

trans-unit.source: Select socache backend provider to use
trans-unit.target: 选择要使用的socache后端供应商

trans-unit.source: Select the 'best' variant by a process of elimination. Each of the following tests is applied in order. Any variants not selected at each test are eliminated. After each test, if only one variant remains, select it as the best match and proceed to step 3. If more than one variant remains, move on to the next test.
trans-unit.target: 通过淘汰的过程选择 "最佳 "变体。依次进行以下每项测试。在每次测试中未被选中的变体将被淘汰。在每次测试后,如果只剩下一个变体,选择它作为最佳匹配,并进入步骤 3。如果剩下一个以上的变体,则进入下一个测试。

trans-unit.source: Select the first variant of those remaining. This will be either the first listed in the type-map file, or when variants are read from the directory, the one whose file name comes first when sorted using ASCII code order.
trans-unit.target: 选择剩余变量中的第一个变量。这将是类型图文件中列出的第一个变体,或者当从目录中读取变体时,使用ASCII码排序时文件名排在前面的那个。

trans-unit.source: Select the variants with the best encoding. If there are variants with an encoding that is acceptable to the user-agent, select only these variants. Otherwise if there is a mix of encoded and non-encoded variants, select only the unencoded variants. If either all variants are encoded or all variants are not encoded, select all variants.
trans-unit.target: 选择具有最佳编码的变体。如果有用户代理可以接受编码的变体,则只选择这些变体。否则,如果有已编码和未编码的变体混合,则只选择未编码的变体。如果所有变体都有编码或所有变体都没有编码,则选择所有变体。

trans-unit.source: Select the variants with the best language match, using either the order of languages in the Accept-Language header (if present), or else the order of languages in the LanguagePriority directive (if present).
trans-unit.target: 使用 Accept-Language 标头（如果存在）中的 LanguagePriority 顺序或LanguagePriority指令（如果存在）中的语言顺序，选择具有最佳语言匹配的变体。

trans-unit.source: Select the variants with the highest 'level' media parameter (used to give the version of text/html media types).
trans-unit.target: 选择具有最高 "级别 "媒体参数的变体(用于给出文本/html媒体类型的版本)。

trans-unit.source: Select the variants with the highest language quality factor.
trans-unit.target: 选择语言质量系数最高的变体。

trans-unit.source: Select the variants with the smallest content length.
trans-unit.target: 选择内容长度最小的变体。

trans-unit.source: Select those variants which have associated charset media parameters that are not ISO-8859-1. If there are no such variants, select all variants instead.
trans-unit.target: 选择那些关联的字符集媒体参数不是 ISO-8859-1的变量。如果没有此类变量，请选择所有变量。

trans-unit.source: Select variants with the best charset media parameters, as given on the Accept-Charset header line. Charset ISO-8859-1 is acceptable unless explicitly excluded. Variants with a text/* media type but not explicitly associated with a particular charset are assumed to be in ISO-8859-1.
trans-unit.target: 选择具有最佳charset媒体参数的变体，如 Accept-Charset 标题行中给出的。除非明确排除，否则Charset ISO-8859-1是可以接受的。具有 text/* 媒体类型但未与特定字符集明确关联的变体被假定为在ISO-8859-1中。

trans-unit.source: Selecting a custom response code; for a non-200 response from the authorizer, the code from the authorizer will be the status of the response
trans-unit.target: 选择自定义响应代码;对于授权者的非200响应,授权者的代码将是响应的状态。

trans-unit.source: Selecting the information shown
trans-unit.target: 选择显示的信息

trans-unit.source: Selects an apr_dbd driver by name. The driver must be installed on your system (on most systems, it will be a shared object or dll). For example, DBDriver mysql will select the MySQL driver in apr_dbd_mysql.so.
trans-unit.target: 通过名称选择apr_dbd驱动程序。该驱动程序必须安装在您的系统上（在大多数系统上，它将是共享对象或dll）。例如， DBDriver mysql 将在apr_dbd_mysql.so中选择MySQL驱动程序。

trans-unit.source: Selects the algorithm used to calculate the challenge and response hashes in digest authentication
trans-unit.target: 选择用于计算摘要认证中的挑战和响应哈希值的算法。

trans-unit.source: Self contained modules are included with the server. Modules that depend on external libraries are provided as separate RPMs to install if needed.
trans-unit.target: 自带的模块包含在服务器中。如果需要,依赖外部库的模块将作为单独的RPM来安装。

trans-unit.source: Send '403 FORBIDDEN' instead of '401 UNAUTHORIZED' if authentication succeeds but authorization fails
trans-unit.target: 如果认证成功但授权失败,发送'403 FORBIDDEN'而不是'401 UNAUTHORIZED'。

trans-unit.source: Send the response headers from the servlet container to the web server (and presumably, onto the browser).

trans-unit.source: SendBufferSize Directive
trans-unit.target: SendBufferSize指令

trans-unit.source: Sendfile
trans-unit.target: Sendfile

trans-unit.source: Sending error pages without a specified character set may allow a cross-site-scripting attack for existing browsers (MSIE) which do not follow the HTTP/1.1 specification and attempt to "guess" the character set from the content. Such browsers can be easily fooled into using the UTF-7 character set, and UTF-7 content from input data (such as the request-URI) will not be escaped by the usual escaping mechanisms designed to prevent cross-site-scripting attacks.
trans-unit.target: 在没有指定字符集的情况下发送错误页面,可能会允许现有的浏览器(MSIE)进行跨站点脚本攻击,这些浏览器不遵循HTTP/1.1规范,试图从内容中 "猜测 "字符集。这样的浏览器很容易被愚弄成使用UTF-7字符集,而且输入数据(如request-URI)中的UTF-7内容将不会被设计成防止跨站点脚本攻击的通常的转义机制所转义。

trans-unit.source: Sending the HUP or restart signal to the parent causes it to kill off its children like in TERM, but the parent doesn't exit. It re-reads its configuration files, and re-opens any log files. Then it spawns a new set of children and continues serving hits.
trans-unit.target: 将 HUP 或 restart 信号发送给父级会导致它像 TERM 中那样杀死其子级，但是父级不会退出。它重新读取其配置文件，并重新打开所有日志文件。然后，它会产生一组新的孩子，并继续提供热门歌曲。

trans-unit.source: Sending the TERM or stop signal to the parent causes it to immediately attempt to kill off all of its children. It may take it several seconds to complete killing off its children. Then the parent itself exits. Any requests in progress are terminated, and no further requests are served.
trans-unit.target: 将 TERM 或 stop 信号发送给父级会使它立即尝试杀死所有子级。杀死所有孩子可能要花几秒钟。然后父母本身退出。正在进行的所有请求都将终止，并且不再处理其他请求。

trans-unit.source: Sends a status code of 204 No Content, telling the client to keep the same page displayed. Valid for all but base.
trans-unit.target: 发送状态代码 204 No Content ，告诉客户端保持显示相同的页面。适用于所有，但 base 。

trans-unit.source: Sends an external permanent redirect asking the client to fetch a different URL
trans-unit.target: 发送一个外部永久重定向,要求客户端获取一个不同的URL。

trans-unit.source: Sends an external redirect asking the client to fetch a different URL
trans-unit.target: 发送一个外部重定向,要求客户端获取一个不同的URL。

trans-unit.target: 根据当前URL的正则表达式匹配发送外部重定向。

trans-unit.source: Server pushes are detected by inspecting the Link headers of responses (see https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc5988 for the specification). When a link thus specified has the rel=preload attribute, it is treated as a resource to be pushed.
trans-unit.target: 通过检查响应的 Link 标头来检测服务器推送（有关规范，请参阅https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc5988）。当这样指定的链接具有 rel=preload 属性时，它将被视为要推送的资源。

trans-unit.source: Server-parsed (SSI) documents processed by mod_include's INCLUDES filter can print environment variables using the echo element, and can use environment variables in flow control elements to makes parts of a page conditional on characteristics of a request. Apache also provides SSI pages with the standard CGI environment variables as discussed above. For more details, see the SSI tutorial.
trans-unit.target: 由 mod_include 的 INCLUDES 过滤器处理的服务器分析（SSI）文档可以使用 echo 元素打印环境变量，并且可以在流控制元素中使用环境变量使页面的某些部分取决于请求的特征。Apache还为SSI页面提供了如上所述的标准CGI环境变量。有关更多详细信息，请参见SSI教程。

trans-unit.source: Serving directly from system memory is universally the fastest method of serving content. Reading files from a disk controller or, even worse, from a remote network is orders of magnitude slower. Disk controllers usually involve physical processes, and network access is limited by your available bandwidth. Memory access on the other hand can take mere nano-seconds.
trans-unit.target: 直接从系统内存服务是普遍最快的内容服务方法。从磁盘控制器或更糟糕的是,从远程网络读取文件的速度要慢很多。磁盘控制器通常涉及物理过程,而网络访问则受限于可用带宽。而另一方面,内存访问可能只需要纳秒。

trans-unit.source: Sessions can either be anonymous, where the session is keyed by a unique UUID string stored on the browser in a cookie, or per user, where the session is keyed against the userid of the logged in user.
trans-unit.target: 会话可以是匿名的（使用存储在浏览器中Cookie中的唯一UUID字符串作为会话的密钥），也可以是每个用户（根据已登录用户的用户ID来作为会话的密钥）。

trans-unit.source: Sessions may be manipulated from other modules that depend on the session, or the session may be read from and written to using environment variables and HTTP headers, as appropriate.
trans-unit.target: 会话可以从依赖于会话的其他模块中进行操作,也可以根据情况使用环境变量和HTTP头来读取和写入会话。

trans-unit.source: Sessions may be stored on the server, or may be stored on the browser. Sessions may also be optionally encrypted for added security. These features are divided into several modules in addition to mod_session; mod_session_crypto, mod_session_cookie and mod_session_dbd. Depending on the server requirements, load the appropriate modules into the server (either statically at compile time or dynamically via the LoadModule directive).
trans-unit.target: 会话可以存储在服务器上，也可以存储在浏览器上。会话也可以选择加密，以提高安全性。除了 mod_session 之外，这些功能还分为几个模块； mod_session_crypto ， mod_session_cookie 和 mod_session_dbd 。根据服务器要求，将适当的模块加载到服务器中（在编译时静态地加载，或者通过 LoadModule 指令动态地加载）。

trans-unit.source: Sessions stored on the server rather than on the browser can also be encrypted as needed, offering privacy where potentially sensitive information is being shared between webservers in a server farm using the mod_session_dbd module.
trans-unit.target: 还可以根据需要对存储在服务器而非浏览器上的会话进行加密，从而在使用 mod_session_dbd 模块在服务器场中的Web服务器之间共享潜在敏感信息的情况下提供隐私。

trans-unit.source: Set to "off" to allow downloading files even if they have wildcard characters in their names.

trans-unit.source: Set to "off" to allow downloading files with wildcards in their names from FTP servers that don't understand wildcard escaping.
trans-unit.target: 设置为 "关闭",允许从不理解通配符转义的FTP服务器下载名称中带有通配符的文件。

trans-unit.source: Set to 1 if the route in the request is different from the route of the worker, i.e. the request couldn't be handled sticky.
trans-unit.target: 如果请求中的路由与工作方的路由不同，则设置为 1 ，即无法将请求处理为粘性。

trans-unit.source: Set to Off, HTML links are rewritten according to the ProxyHTMLURLMap directives, but links appearing in Javascript and CSS are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 设置为 Off ，将根据 ProxyHTMLURLMap 指令重写HTML链接，但忽略Javascript和CSS中出现的链接。

trans-unit.source: Set to On, all scripting events (as determined by ProxyHTMLEvents) and embedded scripts or stylesheets are also processed by the ProxyHTMLURLMap rules, according to the flags set for each rule. Since this requires more parsing, performance will be best if you only enable it when strictly necessary.
trans-unit.target: 设置为 On ，根据每个规则设置的标志， ProxyHTMLURLMap 规则也会处理所有脚本事件（由 ProxyHTMLEvents 确定）和嵌入式脚本或样式表。由于这需要更多的解析，因此，只有在严格必要时才启用它才能获得最佳性能。

trans-unit.source: Sets a configuration parameter which can be used with <IfDefine> sections in the configuration files to conditionally skip or process commands at server startup and restart. Also can be used to set certain less-common startup parameters including -DNO_DETACH (prevent the parent from forking) and -DFOREGROUND (prevent the parent from calling setsid() et al).

trans-unit.source: Sets challenge types and their execution order when proving domain ownership. The names are protocol specific. trans-unit.target: 在证明域所有权时设置挑战类型及其执行顺序。名称是特定于协议的。由Let's Encrypt实现的当前ACME协议版本定义了 mod_md 支持的两种质询类型。默认情况下，它将在端口443上尝试一个。

trans-unit.source: Sets the interval at which the watchdog_step hook runs. Default is to run every second.

trans-unit.source: Sets the server's TCP send buffer size to the number of bytes specified. It is often useful to set this past the OS's standard default value on high speed, high latency connections (i.e., 100ms or so, such as transcontinental fast pipes).

trans-unit.source: Setting CacheDirLevels depends on how many files you anticipate to store in the cache. With the setting of "2" used in the above example, a grand total of 4096 subdirectories can ultimately be created. With 1 million files cached, this works out at roughly 245 cached URLs per directory.
trans-unit.target: 设置 CacheDirLevels 取决于您预期在缓存中存储多少文件。在以上示例中使用的设置为“ 2”时，最终可以创建总共4096个子目录。缓存了100万个文件，每个目录大约有245个缓存URL。

trans-unit.source: Setting KeepAliveTimeout to a high value may cause performance problems in heavily loaded servers. The higher the timeout, the more server processes will be kept occupied waiting on connections with idle clients.
trans-unit.target: 将 KeepAliveTimeout 设置为较高的值可能会导致负载较重的服务器出现性能问题。超时时间越高，等待与空闲客户端的连接时将占用更多服务器进程。

trans-unit.source: Setting MaxConnectionsPerChild to a non-zero value limits the amount of memory that process can consume by (accidental) memory leakage.
trans-unit.target: 将 MaxConnectionsPerChild 设置为非零值将限制进程因（偶然）内存泄漏而消耗的内存量。

trans-unit.source: Setting ScriptInterpreterSource Registry will cause the Windows Registry tree HKEY_CLASSES_ROOT to be searched using the script file extension (e.g., .pl) as a search key. The command defined by the registry subkey Shell\ExecCGI\Command or, if it does not exist, by the subkey Shell\Open\Command is used to open the script file. If the registry keys cannot be found, Apache httpd falls back to the behavior of the Script option.
trans-unit.target: 设置 ScriptInterpreterSource Registry 将导致使用脚本文件扩展名（例如 .pl ）作为搜索键来搜索Windows注册表树 HKEY_CLASSES_ROOT 。由注册表子项 Shell\ExecCGI\Command 定义的命令，或者如果它不存在，则由子项 Shell\Open\Command 用于打开脚本文件。如果找不到注册表项，则Apache httpd会返回到 Script 选项的行为。

trans-unit.source: Setting ServerTokens to less than minimal is not recommended because it makes it more difficult to debug interoperational problems. Also note that disabling the Server: header does nothing at all to make your server more secure. The idea of "security through obscurity" is a myth and leads to a false sense of safety.
trans-unit.target: 不建议将 ServerTokens 设置为小于 minimal 因为这样会使调试互操作问题更加困难。另请注意，禁用Server：标头根本没有任何作用来使您的服务器更安全。 “默默无闻的安全”的想法是一个神话，并导致错误的安全感。

trans-unit.source: Setting the AuthBasicUseDigestAlgorithm directive to MD5 will cause the user's Basic Authentication password to be checked using the same encrypted format as for Digest Authentication. First a string composed from the username, realm name, and password is hashed with MD5; then the username and this encrypted string are passed to the providers listed in AuthBasicProvider as if AuthType was set to Digest and Digest Authentication was in force.
trans-unit.target: 将 AuthBasicUseDigestAlgorithm 指令设置为 MD5 将导致使用与摘要身份验证相同的加密格式来检查用户的基本身份验证密码。首先，由用户名，领域名称和密码组成的字符串用MD5进行哈希处理；然后将用户名和此加密的字符串传递到 AuthBasicProvider 中列出的提供者，就像 AuthType 设置为 Digest 且Digest Authentication生效一样。

trans-unit.source: Setting the SO_REUSEPORT option on the listening socket(s) consequently allows multiple processes (sharing the same EUID, e.g. root) to bind to the the same IP address and port, without the binding error raised by the system in the usual case.
trans-unit.target: 因此，在侦听套接字上设置 SO_REUSEPORT 选项将允许多个进程（共享相同的 EUID ，例如 root ）绑定到相同的IP地址和端口，而在通常情况下系统不会出现绑定错误。

However, including entire directories is not recommended, because it is easy to accidentally leave temporary files in a directory that can cause httpd to fail. Instead, we encourage you to use the wildcard syntax shown below, to include files that match a particular pattern, such as *.conf, for example.
trans-unit.target: 可以在路径的文件名或目录部分中使用Shell样式（ fnmatch() ）通配符，以按字母顺序一次包含多个文件。另外，如果 Include 指向目录而不是文件，则Apache httpd将读取该目录和任何子目录中的所有文件。但是，不建议包括整个目录，因为很容易将临时文件意外地留在目录中，这可能会导致 httpd 失败。相反，我们建议您使用下面显示的通配符语法，以包括与特定模式匹配的文件，例如* .conf。

Second, the reference time uses the time the HTTP request was received instead of the time the request is completed.

trans-unit.source: Since all Apache input and output is based upon the BUFF data type and its methods, the easiest solution was to add the conversion to the BUFF handling routines. The conversion must be settable at any time, so a BUFF flag was added which defines whether a BUFF object has currently enabled conversion or not. This flag is modified at several points in the HTTP protocol:
trans-unit.target: 由于所有Apache的输入和输出都是基于BUFF数据类型和它的方法,最简单的解决方案就是在BUFF处理例程中添加转换功能。转换必须在任何时候都可以设置,所以添加了一个BUFF标志,它定义了一个BUFF对象当前是否启用了转换。这个标志在HTTP协议中的几个点都会被修改。

trans-unit.source: Since custom DH parameters always take precedence over the default ones, this issue can be avoided by creating and configuring them (as described above), thus using a custom/suitable length.
trans-unit.target: 由于自定义DH参数总是优先于默认参数,因此可以通过创建和配置它们(如上所述)来避免这个问题,从而使用自定义/合适的长度。

trans-unit.source: Since httpd 2.0, mod_isapi supports additional features introduced in later versions of the ISAPI specification, as well as limited emulation of async I/O and the TransmitFile semantics. Apache httpd also supports preloading ISAPI .dlls for performance.
trans-unit.target: 从httpd 2.0开始， mod_isapi 支持ISAPI规范的更高版本中引入的其他功能，以及异步I / O和 TransmitFile 语义的有限仿真。Apache httpd还支持预加载ISAPI .dll以提高性能。

trans-unit.source: Since httpd 2.0, unlike 1.3, the %b and %B format strings do not represent the number of bytes sent to the client, but simply the size in bytes of the HTTP response (which will differ, for instance, if the connection is aborted, or if SSL is used). The %O format provided by mod_logio will log the actual number of bytes sent over the network.
trans-unit.target: 从httpd 2.0开始，与1.3不同， %b 和 %B 格式字符串不代表发送给客户端的字节数，而只是代表HTTP响应的字节大小（例如，如果连接中止，字节数将有所不同）。 ，或者使用SSL）。 mod_logio 提供的 %O 格式将记录通过网络发送的实际字节数。

trans-unit.source: Since httpd 2.2.4, responses which have already expired are not stored in the cache. The CacheStoreExpired directive allows this behavior to be overridden. CacheStoreExpired On tells the server to attempt to cache the resource if it is stale. Subsequent requests would trigger an If-Modified-Since request of the origin server, and the response may be fulfilled from cache if the backend resource has not changed.
trans-unit.target: 从httpd 2.2.4开始，已经过期的响应不会存储在缓存中。该 CacheStoreExpired 指令允许被重写此行为。 CacheStoreExpired On告诉服务器尝试缓存过期的资源。后续请求将触发原始服务器的If-Modified-Since请求，并且如果后端资源未更改，则可以从缓存中满足响应。

trans-unit.source: Since mod_rewrite is so powerful, it can indeed be rather complex. This document supplements the reference documentation, and attempts to allay some of that complexity, and provide highly annotated examples of common scenarios that you may handle with mod_rewrite. But we also attempt to show you when you should not use mod_rewrite, and use other standard Apache features instead, thus avoiding this unnecessary complexity.
trans-unit.target: 由于mod_rewrite非常强大，因此确实很复杂。本文档是对参考文档的补充，并试图缓解其中的某些复杂性，并提供了可以通过mod_rewrite处理的常见场景的带批注的示例。但是我们还会尝试向您展示何时不应该使用mod_rewrite，而应使用其他标准Apache功能，从而避免这种不必要的复杂性。

trans-unit.source: Since the File argument may be a partial file name, please remember that a too-short partial filename may match unintended files. trans-unit.target: 由于 File 参数可能是部分文件名，因此请记住，部分文件名太短可能会与意外文件匹配。例如， le.html 将与文件 le.html 匹配，但还将与文件 example.html 匹配。如果可能存在歧义，请尽可能完整地使用文件名，但请记住，将使用遇到的第一个匹配项，并相应地对 AddDescription 指令列表进行排序。

trans-unit.source: So, for example, once a client has authenticated in the "Restricted Files" area, it will automatically retry the same password for any area on the same server that is marked with the "Restricted Files" Realm. Therefore, you can prevent a user from being prompted more than once for a password by letting multiple restricted areas share the same realm. Of course, for security reasons, the client will always need to ask again for the password whenever the hostname of the server changes.
trans-unit.target: 因此，例如，一旦客户端在 "Restricted Files" 区域中进行了身份验证，它将自动为同一服务器上标有 "Restricted Files" 领域的任何区域重试相同的密码。因此，通过让多个受限区域共享同一领域，可以防止多次提示用户输入密码。当然，出于安全原因，每当服务器的主机名更改时，客户端总是需要再次询问密码。

trans-unit.source: So, if you have several virtual hosts using the same certificate and want to use HTTP/2 for them, you need to make sure that all vhosts have exactly the same SSL configuration. You need the same protocol, ciphers and settings for client verification.

trans-unit.source: Some administrators may wish to implement client-side session management that works in concert with the server-side login/logout capabilities offered by this module, for example, by setting or unsetting an HTTP cookie or other such token when a user logs in or out.
trans-unit.target: 一些管理员可能希望实现客户端会话管理,与本模块提供的服务器端登录/注销功能协同工作,例如,当用户登录或退出时,通过设置或取消设置HTTP cookie或其他类似标记。

trans-unit.source: Some back-ends use a slightly different form of stickyness cookie, for instance Apache Tomcat. Tomcat adds the name of the Tomcat instance to the end of its session id cookie, separated with a dot (.) from the session id. Thus if the Apache web server finds a dot in the value of the stickyness cookie, it only uses the part behind the dot to search for the route. In order to let Tomcat know about its instance name, you need to set the attribute jvmRoute inside the Tomcat configuration file conf/server.xml to the value of the route of the worker that connects to the respective Tomcat. The name of the session cookie used by Tomcat (and more generally by Java web applications based on servlets) is JSESSIONID (upper case) but can be configured to something else.
trans-unit.target: 某些后端使用粘性Cookie的形式略有不同，例如Apache Tomcat。 Tomcat将Tomcat实例的名称添加到其会话ID cookie的末尾，并在会话ID中以点号（ . ）分隔。因此，如果Apache Web服务器在粘性cookie的值中找到一个点，则仅使用该点后面的部分来搜索路由。为了让Tomcat知道其实例名称，您需要将Tomcat配置文件 conf/server.xml 中的属性 jvmRoute 设置为连接到各个Tomcat的工作程序的 route 值。 Tomcat（更 JSESSIONID 是基于servlet的Java Web应用程序）使用的会话cookie的名称为JSESSIONID （大写），但可以配置为其他内容。

trans-unit.source: Some modules are only useful for developers and will not be build. when using the module set all. To build all available modules including developer modules use reallyall. In addition the LoadModule directives for all built modules can be activated via the configure option --enable-load-all-modules.

trans-unit.source: Some of the HTTP cookie privacy features are either non-standard, or are not implemented consistently across browsers. The session modules allow you to set cookie parameters, but it makes no guarantee that privacy will be respected by the browser. If security is a concern, use the mod_session_crypto to encrypt the contents of the session, or store the session on the server using the mod_session_dbd module.
trans-unit.target: 一些HTTP cookie隐私功能不是标准的，或者在浏览器之间实现的不一致。会话模块允许您设置cookie参数，但不能保证浏览器会尊重隐私。如果需要考虑安全性，请使用 mod_session_crypto 加密会话的内容，或者使用 mod_session_dbd 模块将会话存储在服务器上。

trans-unit.target: 有些平台可能会出现sendfile支持被破坏的情况,而构建系统没有检测到,特别是当二进制文件是在另一个盒子上构建的,并移动到这样一台支持sendfile被破坏的机器上。

trans-unit.source: Some request methods such as POST include a request body. The HTTP protocol requires that requests which include a body either use chunked transfer encoding or send a Content-Length request header. When passing these requests on to the origin server, mod_proxy_http will always attempt to send the Content-Length. But if the body is large and the original request used chunked encoding, then chunked encoding may also be used in the upstream request. You can control this selection using environment variables. Setting proxy-sendcl ensures maximum compatibility with upstream servers by always sending the Content-Length, while setting proxy-sendchunked minimizes resource usage by using chunked encoding.
trans-unit.target: 一些请求方法（例如POST）包括请求正文。 HTTP协议要求包含正文的请求使用分块传输编码或发送 Content-Length 请求标头。将这些请求传递到原始服务器时， mod_proxy_http 将始终尝试发送 Content-Length 。但是，如果主体很大，并且原始请求使用了分块编码，那么分块编码也可以在上游请求中使用。您可以使用环境变量控制此选择。设置 proxy-sendcl 可通过始终发送 Content-Length 来确保与上游服务器的最大兼容性，同时设置 proxy-sendchunked 通过使用分块编码来最大程度地减少资源使用。

trans-unit.source: Some section types can be nested inside other section types. On the one hand, <Files> can be used inside <Directory>. On the other hand, <If> can be used inside <Directory>, <Location>, and <Files> sections (but not inside another <If>). The regex counterparts of the named section behave identically.
trans-unit.target: 某些节类型可以嵌套在其他节类型中。一方面，可以在 <Directory> 内部使用 <Files> >。另一方面， <If> 可以在 <Directory> ， <Location> 和 <Files> 节中使用（但不能在另一个 <If> 中使用）。命名部分的正则表达式的行为相同。

trans-unit.source: Some servers, like Microsoft IIS, load the ISAPI extension into the server and keep it loaded until memory usage is too high, or unless configuration options are specified. Apache currently loads and unloads the ISAPI extension each time it is requested, unless the ISAPICacheFile directive is specified. This is inefficient, but Apache's memory model makes this the most effective method. Many ISAPI modules are subtly incompatible with the Apache server, and unloading these modules helps to ensure the stability of the server.
trans-unit.target: 某些服务器（例如Microsoft IIS）将ISAPI扩展加载到服务器中并保持加载状态，直到内存使用率过高或除非指定了配置选项。除非指定了 ISAPICacheFile 指令，否则Apache当前每次都会在每次请求时加载和卸载ISAPI扩展。这效率低下，但是Apache的内存模型使之成为最有效的方法。许多ISAPI模块与Apache服务器都有细微的不兼容，而卸载这些模块有助于确保服务器的稳定性。

trans-unit.source: Some sites with thousands of users use a structured homedir layout, i.e. each homedir is in a subdirectory which begins (for instance) with the first character of the username. So, /~larry/anypath is /home/l/larry/public_html/anypath while /~waldo/anypath is /home/w/waldo/public_html/anypath.
trans-unit.target: 一些具有数千用户的站点使用结构化的homedir布局，即每个homedir位于子目录中，该子目录（例如）以用户名的第一个字符开头。因此， /~larry/anypath 是 /home/l/larry/public_html/anypath ,而 /~waldo/anypath 是 /home/w/waldo/public_html/anypath 。

trans-unit.source: Some tools need to be forced to use CRLF, otherwise httpd will return a HTTP 400 response like described in the above use case. For example, the OpenSSL s_client needs the -crlf parameter to work properly.
trans-unit.target: 需要强制某些工具使用CRLF，否则httpd将返回HTTP 400响应，如上述用例中所述。例如，OpenSSL s_client需要-crlf参数才能正常工作。

trans-unit.source: Some useful examples
trans-unit.target: 一些有用的例子

trans-unit.source: Some users of DBD authentication in HTTPD 2.2/2.4 have reported that it imposes a problematic load on the database. This is most likely where an HTML page contains hundreds of objects (e.g. images, scripts, etc) each of which requires authentication. Users affected (or concerned) by this kind of problem should use mod_authn_socache to cache credentials and take most of the load off the database.
trans-unit.target: HTTPD 2.2 / 2.4中的某些DBD身份验证用户报告说，这对数据库造成了问题。在HTML页面包含数百个对象（例如，图像，脚本等）的每个对象中，每个对象都需要进行身份验证，这很有可能。受此类问题影响（或担心）的用户应使用 mod_authn_socache 来缓存凭据，并减轻数据库的大部分负担。

trans-unit.source: Some users of more heavyweight authentication such as SQL database lookups (mod_authn_dbd) have reported it putting an unacceptable load on their authentication provider. A typical case in point is where an HTML page contains hundreds of objects (images, scripts, stylesheets, media, etc), and a request to the page generates hundreds of effectively-immediate requests for authenticated additional contents.
trans-unit.target: 一些使用SQL数据库查询（ mod_authn_dbd ）等重量级身份验证的用户报告说，这给他们的身份验证提供程序带来了不可接受的负担。一个典型的例子就是HTML页面包含数百个对象（图像，脚本，样式表，媒体等），并且对该页面的请求会生成数百个对已认证的其他内容的有效即时请求。

trans-unit.source: Some web applications are vulnerable to an information disclosure attack when a TLS connection carries compressed data. For more information, review the details of the "BREACH" family of attacks.
trans-unit.target: 当TLS连接携带压缩数据时,一些Web应用程序容易受到信息披露攻击。要了解更多信息,请查看 "BREACH "系列攻击的详细信息。

trans-unit.source: Some web applications are vulnerable to an information disclosure attack when a TLS connection carries deflate compressed data. For more information, review the details of the "BREACH" family of attacks.
trans-unit.target: 当TLS连接携带deflate压缩数据时,一些Web应用程序容易受到信息披露攻击。更多信息,请查看 "BREACH "系列攻击的细节。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes applications encode the session identifier into the URL like in the following Examples:
trans-unit.target: 有时,应用程序会将会话标识符编码到URL中,比如下面的例子。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes the MPM needs to perform a lingering close, namely sending back an early error to the client while it is still transmitting data to httpd. Sending the response and then closing the connection immediately is not the correct thing to do since the client (still trying to send the rest of the request) would get a connection reset and could not read the httpd's response. The lingering close is time bounded but it can take relatively long time, so it's offloaded to a worker thread (including the shutdown hooks and real socket close). From 2.4.28 onward this is also the case when connections finally timeout (the listener thread never handles connections besides waiting for and dispatching their events).
trans-unit.target: 有时,MPM需要执行一个滞留关闭,即在客户端还在向httpd传输数据时,向客户端发送一个早期错误。发送响应后立即关闭连接并不是正确的做法,因为客户端(还在尝试发送剩余的请求)会得到一个连接重置,无法读取httpd的响应。滞留关闭是有时间限制的,但它可能需要相对较长的时间,所以它被卸载到一个worker线程(包括关闭钩子和真正的socket关闭)。从2.4.28开始,当连接最终超时时,也是这种情况(监听器线程除了等待和派发其事件外,从不处理连接)。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes, the server runs behind a device that processes SSL, such as a reverse proxy, load balancer or SSL offload appliance. When this is the case, specify the https:// scheme and the port number to which the clients connect in the ServerName directive to make sure that the server generates the correct self-referential URLs.
trans-unit.target: 有时，服务器在运行SSL的设备（例如反向代理，负载平衡器或SSL卸载设备）后面运行。在这种情况下，请在 ServerName 指令中指定 https:// 方案和客户端连接的端口号，以确保服务器生成正确的自引用URL。

trans-unit.source: Speaking of SSL, you need to be aware that most browsers will speak HTTP/2 only on https: URLs, so you need a server with SSL support. But not only that, you will need a SSL library that supports the ALPN extension. If OpenSSL is the library you use, you need at least version 1.0.2.
trans-unit.target: 说到SSL，您需要意识到大多数浏览器只会在 https: URL 上使用HTTP / 2 ，因此您需要一台具有SSL支持的服务器。不仅如此，您还需要一个支持 ALPN 扩展的SSL库。如果您使用的是OpenSSL库，则至少需要版本1.0.2。

trans-unit.source: Special IPv6 Considerations
trans-unit.target: IPv6的特殊考虑

trans-unit.source: Special Purpose Environment Variables
trans-unit.target: 特殊用途环境变量

trans-unit.source: Special care must be taken when using this directive. If ServerLimit is set to a value much higher than necessary, extra, unused shared memory will be allocated. If both ServerLimit and MaxRequestWorkers are set to values higher than the system can handle, Apache httpd may not start or the system may become unstable.
trans-unit.target: 使用此指令时必须特别注意。如果将 ServerLimit 设置为比必要的值高得多的值，则会分配额外的未使用共享内存。如果将 ServerLimit 和 MaxRequestWorkers 的值都设置为高于系统可以处理的值，则Apache httpd可能无法启动，或者系统可能变得不稳定。

trans-unit.source: Special care must be taken when using this directive. If ThreadLimit is set to a value much higher than ThreadsPerChild, extra unused shared memory will be allocated. If both ThreadLimit and ThreadsPerChild are set to values higher than the system can handle, Apache httpd may not start or the system may become unstable. Do not set the value of this directive any higher than your greatest predicted setting of ThreadsPerChild for the current run of Apache httpd.
trans-unit.target: 使用此指令时必须特别注意。如果将 ThreadLimit 设置为比 ThreadsPerChild 高得多的值，则会分配额外的未使用共享内存。如果将 ThreadLimit 和 ThreadsPerChild 都设置为高于系统可处理的值，则Apache httpd可能无法启动，或者系统可能变得不稳定。对于当前运行的Apache httpd，请勿将此指令的值设置为高于最大的 ThreadsPerChild 预测设置。

trans-unit.source: Special notes
trans-unit.target: 特别说明

trans-unit.source: Specialized File Caching
trans-unit.target: 专门的文件缓存

trans-unit.source: Specialized file caching
trans-unit.target: 专门的文件缓存

trans-unit.source: Specific IP addresses or ports have precedence over their wildcard equivalents, and any virtual host that matches has precedence over the servers base configuration.
trans-unit.target: 特定的IP地址或端口优先于它们的通配符,任何匹配的虚拟主机优先于服务器的基本配置。

trans-unit.source: Specific packages
trans-unit.target: 具体配套

trans-unit.source: Specifies early processing.
trans-unit.target: 指定早期处理。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a filename to record statistics.
trans-unit.target: 指定记录统计数据的文件名。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a list of client certificate files (DER format) that are used when creating a proxied SSL connection. Each client certificate used by a server must be listed separately in its own .der file.
trans-unit.target: 指定创建代理SSL连接时使用的客户端证书文件列表（DER格式）。服务器使用的每个客户端证书必须在其自己的 .der 文件中单独列出。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a space-separated list of file names to be loaded when the Apache server is launched, and remain loaded until the server is shut down. This directive may be repeated for every ISAPI .dll file desired. The full path name of each file should be specified. If the path name is not absolute, it will be treated relative to ServerRoot.
trans-unit.target: 指定以空格分隔的文件名列表，该文件名将在启动Apache服务器时加载，并保持加载状态，直到关闭服务器为止。可以为每个ISAPI .dll文件重复此指令。应该指定每个文件的完整路径名。如果路径名不是绝对的，则将相对于 ServerRoot 进行处理。

trans-unit.source: Specifies an expression that controls whether the environment variable that follows will be modified. For information on the expression syntax, see the examples that follow or the full specification at the ap_expr documentation.
trans-unit.target: 指定一个表达式，该表达式控制是否修改后面的环境变量。有关表达式语法的信息，请参阅以下示例或ap_expr文档中的完整规范。

trans-unit.source: Specifies an optional SQL query to use after successful login (or logout) to redirect the user to a URL, which may be specific to the user. The user's ID will be passed as a single string parameter when the SQL query is executed. It may be referenced within the query statement using a %s format specifier.
trans-unit.target: 指定一个可选的SQL查询，该查询在成功登录（或注销）后用于将用户重定向到特定于该用户的URL。执行SQL查询时，用户ID将作为单个字符串参数传递。它可以使用 %s 格式说明符在查询语句中引用。

trans-unit.source: Specifies elements that have URL attributes that should be rewritten using standard ProxyHTMLURLMaps. You will need one ProxyHTMLLinks directive per element, but it can have any number of attributes.
trans-unit.target: 指定具有应使用标准 ProxyHTMLURLMap 重写的URL属性的元素。每个元素将需要一个 ProxyHTMLLinks 指令，但是它可以具有任意数量的属性。

trans-unit.source: Specifies how Apache should encode special characters contained in the variable before outputting them. If set to none, no encoding will be done. If set to url, then URL encoding (also known as %-encoding; this is appropriate for use within URLs in links, etc.) will be performed. If set to urlencoded, application/x-www-form-urlencoded compatible encoding will be performed instead, and should be used with query strings. If set to base64, base64 encoding will be performed. At the start of an echo element, the default is set to entity, resulting in entity encoding (which is appropriate in the context of a block-level HTML element, e.g. a paragraph of text). This can be changed by adding an encoding attribute, which will remain in effect until the next encoding attribute is encountered or the element ends, whichever comes first.
trans-unit.target: 指定Apache在输出变量之前应如何编码包含在变量中的特殊字符。如果设置为 none ，则不会进行编码。如果设置为 url ，则将执行URL编码（也称为％-encoding；这适用于链接中的URL等）。如果设置为 urlencoded ，则将改为执行application / x-www-form-urlencoded兼容编码，并且应与查询字符串一起使用。如果设置为 base64 ，将执行base64编码。在 echo 元素的开始处，默认设置为 entity ，导致实体编码（这在块级HTML元素的上下文中是合适的，例如一段文字）。可以通过添加 encoding 属性来更改此设置，该属性将一直有效，直到遇到下一个 encoding 属性或元素结束（以先到者为准）。

trans-unit.source: Specifies how Apache should encode special characters contained in the variable before setting them. The default is none, where no encoding will be done. If set to url, urlencoding, base64 or entity, URL encoding, application/x-www-form-urlencoded encoding, base64 encoding or HTML entity encoding will be performed respectively. More than one encoding can be specified by separating with commas. The encoding setting will remain in effect until the next encoding attribute is encountered, or the element ends. The encoding attribute must precede the corresponding var attribute to be effective. Encodings are applied after all decodings have been stripped.
trans-unit.target: 指定Apache在设置特殊字符之前应如何对变量中包含的特殊字符进行编码。默认值为 none ，其中不进行任何编码。如果设置为 url ， urlencoding ， base64 或 entity ，则将分别执行URL编码，application / x-www-form-urlencoded编码，base64编码或HTML实体编码。可以使用逗号分隔来指定一种以上的编码。编码设置将一直有效，直到遇到下一个编码属性，或者元素结束。的 encoding 属性必须先于相应的 var 属性有效。去除所有解码之后，再应用编码。

trans-unit.source: Specifies one or more attributes to treat as scripting events and apply ProxyHTMLURLMaps to where enabled. You can specify any number of attributes in one or more ProxyHTMLEvents directives.
trans-unit.target: 指定一个或多个属性，将其视为脚本事件，并将 ProxyHTMLURLMap 应用于启用的位置。您可以在一个或多个 ProxyHTMLEvents 指令中指定任意数量的属性。

trans-unit.source: Specifies one or more native system environment variables to make available as internal environment variables, which are available to Apache HTTP Server modules as well as propagated to CGI scripts and SSI pages. Values come from the native OS environment of the shell which invoked the httpd process.
trans-unit.target: 指定一个或多个本机系统环境变量以用作内部环境变量，这些变量可用于Apache HTTP Server模块以及传播到CGI脚本和SSI页面。值来自调用 httpd 进程的Shell的本机OS环境。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the CGI environment variable to change, such as PATH_INFO. If preceded by an exclamation point, the variable will be unset.
trans-unit.target: 指定要更改的CGI环境变量,如PATH_INFO。如果前面有感叹号,则该变量将被取消设置。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the LDAP objectClass values used to identify if queried directory objects really are group objects (as opposed to user objects) during the Require ldap-group directive's sub-group processing.
trans-unit.target: 指定LDAP objectClass值，该值用于在 Require ldap-group 指令的子组处理期间标识查询的目录对象是否确实是组对象（与用户对象相对）。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the LDAP server, the base DN, the attribute to use in the search, as well as the extra search filter to use.
trans-unit.target: 指定LDAP服务器、基础DN、搜索中要使用的属性,以及要使用的额外搜索过滤器。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the SSL/TLS mode to be used when connecting to an LDAP server.
trans-unit.target: 指定连接到LDAP服务器时要使用的SSL/TLS模式。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the attribute labels, one value per directive line, used to distinguish the members of the current group that are groups.
trans-unit.target: 指定属性标签,每个指令行一个值,用于区分当前组的成员是组。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the directory path and file name of the shared memory cache file. If not set, anonymous shared memory will be used if the platform supports it.
trans-unit.target: 指定共享内存缓存文件的目录路径和文件名。如果没有设置,如果平台支持,将使用匿名共享内存。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the file name suffix for the file containing the meta information. For example, the default values for the two directives will cause a request to DOCUMENT_ROOT/somedir/index.html to look in DOCUMENT_ROOT/somedir/.web/index.html.meta and will use its contents to generate additional MIME header information.
trans-unit.target: 指定包含元信息的文件的文件名后缀。例如，这两个伪指令的默认值将导致请求 DOCUMENT_ROOT/somedir/index.html 查找 DOCUMENT_ROOT/somedir/.web/index.html.meta ，并将使用其内容生成其他MIME标头信息。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the maximum age, in seconds, that a pooled LDAP connection can remain idle and still be available for use. Connections are cleaned up when they are next needed, not asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: 指定池化 LDAP 连接可以保持空闲并仍可使用的最大时间(以秒为单位)。当下一次需要时,连接会被清理,而不是异步清理。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the maximum number of servers that will be sending heartbeat requests to this server
trans-unit.target: 指定向该服务器发送心跳请求的服务器的最大数量。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the maximum size of the primary LDAP cache. This cache contains successful search/binds. Set it to 0 to turn off search/bind caching. The default size is 1024 cached searches.
trans-unit.target: 指定主要 LDAP 缓存的最大大小。该缓存包含成功的搜索/绑定。将其设置为0可以关闭搜索/绑定缓存。默认大小是1024个缓存搜索。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the maximum sub-group nesting depth that will be evaluated before the user search is discontinued.
trans-unit.target: 指定在停止用户搜索之前将评估的最大子组嵌套深度。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the name of the directory in which Apache can find meta information files. The directory is usually a 'hidden' subdirectory of the directory that contains the file being accessed. Set to "." to look in the same directory as the file:
trans-unit.target: 指定Apache可以在其中找到元信息文件的目录的名称。该目录通常是包含正在访问的文件的目录的“隐藏”子目录。设置为“ . ”以查找与文件相同的目录：

trans-unit.source: Specifies the number of bytes to allocate for the shared memory cache. The default is 500kb. If set to 0, shared memory caching will not be used and every HTTPD process will create its own cache.
trans-unit.target: 指定为共享内存缓存分配的字节数。默认值是500kb。如果设置为0,则不使用共享内存缓存,每个HTTPD进程将创建自己的缓存。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the port and the eDirectory based certificate name that will be used to enable SSL encryption. An optional third parameter also enables mutual authentication.
trans-unit.target: 指定用于启用SSL加密的端口和基于电子目录的证书名称。可选的第三个参数还可以启用相互认证。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the prefix for environment variables set during authorization
trans-unit.target: 指定授权时设置的环境变量的前缀。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the protocol to use. Currently, only ACME is supported.
trans-unit.target: 指定要使用的协议。当前仅支持 ACME 。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the replacement value for the preceding environment variable. Backreferences, such as "$1", can be included from regular expression captures in <var>conditional-expression</var>. If omitted, the variable is set (or overridden) to an empty string — but see the Note below.
trans-unit.target: 指定前面的环境变量的替换值。可以从 <var>conditional-expression</var> 正则表达式捕获中包含反向引用，例如“ $ 1” 。如果省略，则将变量设置（或覆盖）为空字符串-但请参见下面的注释。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the socket connection timeout in seconds
trans-unit.target: 指定插座连接超时时间,单位为秒。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the time (in seconds) that an item in the search/bind cache remains valid. The default is 600 seconds (10 minutes).
trans-unit.target: 指定搜索/绑定缓存中的项目保持有效的时间(秒)。默认为600秒(10分钟)。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the time (in seconds) that entries in the operation cache remain valid. The default is 600 seconds.
trans-unit.target: 指定操作缓存中的条目保持有效的时间(秒)。默认为600秒。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the timeout for LDAP search and bind operations, in seconds
trans-unit.target: 指定LDAP搜索和绑定操作的超时时间,以秒为单位。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the transformation of the basic authentication username to be used when binding to the LDAP server to perform a DN lookup
trans-unit.target: 指定基本认证用户名的转换,当绑定到LDAP服务器执行DN查找时,将使用该用户名。

trans-unit.source: Specifies userIDs that are allowed access without password verification
trans-unit.target: 指定无需密码验证即可访问的用户ID。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether Apache should strip an encoding from the variable before processing the variable further. The default is none, where no decoding will be done. If set to url, urlencoded, base64 or entity, URL decoding, application/x-www-form-urlencoded decoding, base64 decoding or HTML entity decoding will be performed respectively. More than one decoding can be specified by separating with commas. The decoding setting will remain in effect until the next decoding attribute is encountered, or the element ends. The decoding attribute must precede the corresponding var attribute to be effective.
trans-unit.target: 指定Apache在进一步处理变量之前是否应从变量中删除编码。默认值为 none ，其中不进行解码。如果设置为 url ， urlencoded ， base64 或 entity ，则将分别执行URL解码，application / x-www-form-urlencoded解码，base64解码或HTML实体解码。通过用逗号分隔可以指定多个解码。解码设置将一直有效，直到遇到下一个解码属性，或者元素结束。的 decoding 属性必须先于相应的 var 属性是有效的。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether Apache should strip an encoding from the variable before processing the variable further. The default is none, where no decoding will be done. If set to url, then URL decoding (also known as %-encoding; this is appropriate for use within URLs in links, etc.) will be performed. If set to urlencoded, application/x-www-form-urlencoded compatible encoding (found in query strings) will be stripped. If set to base64, base64 will be decoded, and if set to entity, HTML entity encoding will be stripped. Decoding is done prior to any further encoding on the variable. Multiple encodings can be stripped by specifying more than one comma separated encoding. The decoding setting will remain in effect until the next decoding attribute is encountered, or the element ends.
trans-unit.target: 指定Apache在进一步处理变量之前是否应从变量中删除编码。默认值为 none ，其中不进行解码。如果设置为 url ，则将执行URL解码（也称为％-encoding；这适用于链接中的URL等）。如果设置为 urlencoded ，则将剥离application / x-www-form-urlencoded兼容编码（在查询字符串中找到）。如果设置为 base64 ，则base64将被解码，如果设置为 entity ，HTML实体编码将被剥离。在对该变量进行任何进一步编码之前，先完成解码。通过指定多个逗号分隔的编码，可以剥离多种编码。解码设置将一直有效，直到遇到下一个解码属性，或者元素结束。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether blank passwords are allowed
trans-unit.target: 指定是否允许使用空白密码

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether the filter changes the content, including possibly the content length. The "no" argument is supported in 2.4.7 and later.
trans-unit.target: 指定过滤器是否改变内容,可能包括内容的长度。2.4.7及以后的版本支持 "no "参数。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether the user must specify an email address as the password. This prohibits blank passwords.
trans-unit.target: 指定用户是否必须指定电子邮件地址作为密码。这禁止使用空白密码。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether to force the verification of a server certificate when establishing an SSL connection to the LDAP server.
trans-unit.target: 指定在与LDAP服务器建立SSL连接时是否强制验证服务器证书。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether to use the user DN or the username when doing comparisons for the Require ldap-group directive.
trans-unit.target: 指定在对 Require ldap-group 指令进行比较时是使用用户DN还是用户名。

trans-unit.source: Specifies which LDAP objectClass values identify directory objects that are groups during sub-group processing.
trans-unit.target: 指定在子组处理过程中,哪些LDAP objectClass值可以识别为组的目录对象。

trans-unit.source: Specify None to disable a provider enabled with this directive in an outer scope, such as in a parent directory.
trans-unit.target: 指定 None 以在外部范围（例如，父目录）中禁用使用此伪指令启用的提供程序。

trans-unit.source: Specify <var>limit</var> as the total disk cache inode limit.
trans-unit.target: 将 <var>limit</var> 指定为磁盘缓存inode的总限制。

trans-unit.source: Specify limit as the total disk cache size limit. The value is expressed in bytes by default (or attaching B to the number). Attach K for Kbytes or M for MBytes.
trans-unit.target: 将 limit 指定为磁盘高速缓存总大小限制。默认情况下，该值以字节表示（或在数字后附加 B ）。附加 K (代表千字节）或 M (代表兆字节）。

trans-unit.source: Specify path as the root directory of the disk cache. This should be the same value as specified with the CacheRoot directive.
trans-unit.target: 将 path 指定为磁盘缓存的根目录。该值应与 CacheRoot 指令指定的值相同。

trans-unit.source: Specify <var>pidfile</var> as the name of the file to write the process ID to when daemonized.
trans-unit.target: 指定 <var>pidfile</var> 作为文件的名称，以在守护进程写入进程ID。

trans-unit.source: Specify <var>round</var> as the amount to round sizes up to, to compensate for disk block sizes. Set to the block size of the cache partition.
trans-unit.target: 将 <var>round</var> 入指定为舍入到最大大小的数量，以补偿磁盘块大小。设置为缓存分区的块大小。

trans-unit.source: Specify HTML elements that have URL attributes to be rewritten.
trans-unit.target: 指定具有URL属性的HTML元素进行重写。

trans-unit.source: Specify SSL/TLS cipher suite (See openssl ciphers)
trans-unit.target: 指定SSL/TLS密码套件(参见openssl ciphers)

trans-unit.source: Specify SSL/TLS protocol (SSL2, SSL3, TLS1, TLS1.1, TLS1.2, or ALL). TLS1.1 and TLS1.2 support available in 2.4.4 and later.
trans-unit.target: 指定SSL/TLS协议(SSL2、SSL3、TLS1、TLS1.1、TLS1.2或ALL)。TLS1.1和TLS1.2支持在2.4.4及以后的版本中提供。

trans-unit.source: Specify a charset for mod_proxy_html output.
trans-unit.target: 为mod_proxy_html输出指定一个字符集。

trans-unit.source: Specify a context string for use in the cache key
trans-unit.target: 指定用于缓存键的上下文字符串。

trans-unit.source: Specify the behavior of the in-memory code cache. The default is stat, which stats the top level script (not any included ones) each time that file is needed, and reloads it if the modified time indicates it is newer than the one it has already loaded. The other values cause it to keep the file cached forever (don't stat and replace) or to never cache the file.
trans-unit.target: 指定内存中代码缓存的行为。默认值是stat,它在每次需要该文件时统计顶层脚本(不包括任何包含的脚本),如果修改后的时间表明它比已经加载的文件更新,则重新加载。其他的值会使它永远保持文件的缓存(不要统计和替换)或者永远不缓存文件。

trans-unit.source: Start the server and try to reproduce the core-dump. For this you may want to use a directive like ``CoreDumpDirectory /tmp'' to make sure that the core-dump file can be written. This should result in a /tmp/core or /tmp/httpd.core file. If you don't get one of these, try running your server under a non-root UID. Many modern kernels do not allow a process to dump core after it has done a setuid() (unless it does an exec()) for security reasons (there can be privileged information left over in memory). If necessary, you can run /path/to/httpd -X manually to force Apache to not fork.
trans-unit.target: 启动服务器，然后尝试重现核心转储。为此，您可能需要使用诸如`` CoreDumpDirectory /tmp ''之类的指令来确保可以写入core-dump文件。这将导致一个 /tmp/core 或 /tmp/httpd.core 文件。如果没有其中之一，请尝试在非根UID下运行服务器。出于安全原因（内存中可能保留有特权信息），许多现代内核不允许进程在完成 setuid() 之后转储核心（除非它执行 exec() ）。如有必要，可以手动运行 /path/to/httpd -X 强制Apache不进行派生。

trans-unit.source: Strictly limiting access is essential if you are using a forward proxy (using the ProxyRequests directive). Otherwise, your server can be used by any client to access arbitrary hosts while hiding his or her true identity. This is dangerous both for your network and for the Internet at large. When using a reverse proxy (using the ProxyPass directive with ProxyRequests Off), access control is less critical because clients can only contact the hosts that you have specifically configured.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用正向代理（使用 ProxyRequests 指令），则严格限制访问权限至关重要。否则，任何客户端都可以使用您的服务器来访问任意主机，同时隐藏其真实身份。这对于您的网络和整个Internet都是危险的。使用反向代理时（将 ProxyPass 指令与 ProxyRequests Off 一起使用），访问控制的重要性不那么严格，因为客户端只能与您专门配置的主机联系。

trans-unit.source: Suppose Alice wants to send a message to her bank to transfer some money. Alice would like the message to be private, since it will include information such as her account number and transfer amount. One solution is to use a cryptographic algorithm, a technique that would transform her message into an encrypted form, unreadable until it is decrypted. Once in this form, the message can only be decrypted by using a secret key. Without the key the message is useless: good cryptographic algorithms make it so difficult for intruders to decode the original text that it isn't worth their effort.
trans-unit.target: 假设Alice想给她的银行发一条信息,让她转一些钱。爱丽丝希望信息是私密的,因为它将包括她的账号和转账金额等信息。一种解决方案是使用一种加密算法,这种技术可以将她的信息转化为一种加密形式,在解密之前无法读取。一旦进入这种形式,信息只能通过使用秘密密钥来解密。如果没有密钥,信息就毫无用处:好的加密算法使入侵者很难解读原文,以至于不值得他们付出努力。

trans-unit.source: Suppose that www.example.dom has address 192.0.2.1. Then consider this configuration snippet:
trans-unit.target: 假设 www.example.dom 的地址为192.0.2.1。然后考虑以下配置片段：

trans-unit.source: Suppose that time repeats itself for some reason. That is, suppose that the system's clock is screwed up and it revisits a past time (or it is too far forward, is reset correctly, and then revisits the future time). In this case we can easily show that we can get pid and time stamp reuse. The choice of initializer for the counter is intended to help defeat this. Note that we really want a random number to initialize the counter, but there aren't any readily available numbers on most systems (i.e., you can't use rand() because you need to seed the generator, and can't seed it with the time because time, at least at one second resolution, has repeated itself). This is not a perfect defense.
trans-unit.target: 假设时间由于某种原因而重演。也就是说，假设系统的时钟搞砸了，并且它会重新查看过去的时间（或者它太远了，正确地重置了，然后重新考虑了将来的时间）。在这种情况下，我们可以轻松地表明我们可以获得pid和时间戳重用。选择计数器的初始化程序旨在帮助克服这一问题。请注意，我们确实希望使用随机数来初始化计数器，但是在大多数系统上没有任何可用的数字（即，您不能使用rand（），因为您需要对生成器进行种子设置，也无法对其进行种子设置时间，因为时间（至少以一秒的分辨率）已经重复了一次）。这不是一个完美的防御。

trans-unit.source: Suppose that you've assigned 192.0.2.1 to www.example1.dom and 192.0.2.2 to www.example2.dom. Furthermore, suppose that example1.dom has control of their own DNS. With this config you have put example1.dom into a position where they can steal all traffic destined to example2.dom. To do so, all they have to do is set www.example1.dom to 192.0.2.2. Since they control their own DNS you can't stop them from pointing the www.example1.dom record wherever they wish.
trans-unit.target: 假设您已将192.0.2.1分配给 www.example1.dom ,并将192.0.2.2 分配给 www.example2.dom 。此外，假设 example1.dom 可以控制自己的DNS。通过此配置，您已将 example1.dom 置于可以窃取发往 example2.dom 的所有流量的位置。为此，他们要做的就是将 www.example1.dom 设置为192.0.2.2。由于它们控制自己的DNS，因此您无法阻止他们将 www.example1.dom 记录指向任何希望的地方。

trans-unit.source: Symbols in the executable program are usually not referenced by the DSO (because it's a reusable library of general code) and hence no further resolving has to be done. The executable program has no need to do anything on its own to use the symbols from the DSO because the complete resolving is done by the Unix loader. (In fact, the code to invoke ld.so is part of the run-time startup code which is linked into every executable program which has been bound non-static). The advantage of dynamic loading of common library code is obvious: the library code needs to be stored only once, in a system library like libc.so, saving disk space for every program.
trans-unit.target: DSO通常不引用可执行程序中的符号（因为它是通用代码的可重用库），因此无需进行进一步的解析。可执行程序不需要自己做任何事情即可使用DSO中的符号，因为完全的解析是由Unix加载器完成的。（实际上，调用 ld.so 的代码是运行时启动代码的一部分，该代码链接到已绑定为非静态的每个可执行程序中）。动态加载通用库代码的优势非常明显：库代码只需在 libc.so 之类的系统库中存储一次，即可为每个程序节省磁盘空间。

trans-unit.source: System memory isn't cheap though, byte for byte it's by far the most expensive type of storage and it's important to ensure that it is used efficiently. By caching files in memory you decrease the amount of memory available on the system. As we'll see, in the case of operating system caching, this is not so much of an issue, but when using httpd's own in-memory caching it is important to make sure that you do not allocate too much memory to a cache. Otherwise the system will be forced to swap out memory, which will likely degrade performance.
trans-unit.target: 不过系统内存并不便宜,按字节计算,它是目前最昂贵的存储类型,确保它的有效使用非常重要。通过在内存中缓存文件,你可以减少系统的可用内存。正如我们将看到的,在操作系统缓存的情况下,这并不是一个太大的问题,但是当使用httpd自己的内存缓存时,确保不要给缓存分配太多的内存是很重要的。否则系统将被迫交换内存,这很可能会降低性能。

trans-unit.source: The shared object cache API (socache) and its provider modules provide a server wide key/value based shared object cache. These modules are designed to cache low level data such as SSL sessions and authentication credentials. Backends allow the data to be stored server wide in shared memory, or datacenter wide in a cache such as memcache or distcache.
trans-unit.target: 的共享对象缓存API（socache）和它的支持模块提供一个服务器宽的键/值基于共享对象缓存。这些模块旨在缓存低级数据，例如SSL会话和身份验证凭据。后端允许将数据存储在服务器范围内的共享内存中，或数据中心范围内的数据存储在诸如memcache或distcache之类的缓存中。

trans-unit.target: 该MAPNAME是地图的名称，将被用于通过以下构建体中的一个来指定一个重写规则的替换字符串的映射功能：

trans-unit.target: 该替换重写规则的是，取代了由匹配原始URL路径字符串模式。该换人可能是：

trans-unit.source: The ! directive is useful in situations where you don't want to reverse-proxy a subdirectory, e.g.
trans-unit.target: 该 ! 伪指令在不需要反向代理子目录的情况下很有用，例如

trans-unit.source: The ! directive is useful in situations where you don't want to reverse-proxy a subdirectory.
trans-unit.target: 该 ! 伪指令在您不想反向代理子目录的情况下很有用。

trans-unit.source: The %s format specifier is only available in Apache 2.1 and later; it can be used instead of %e to avoid the overhead of enabling SSLOptions +StdEnvVars. If SSLOptions +StdEnvVars must be enabled anyway for some other reason, %e will be more efficient than %s.
trans-unit.target: 在 %s 格式说明仅在Apache的2.1及更高版本; 可以使用它代替 %e 来避免启用 SSLOptions +StdEnvVars 的开销。如果 SSLOptions +StdEnvVars 任何其他原因必须启用SSLOptions + StdEnvVars，则 %e 将比 %s 更有效率。

trans-unit.source: The %v is used to log the name of the virtual host that is serving the request. Then a program like split-logfile can be used to post-process the access log in order to split it into one file per virtual host.
trans-unit.target: 在 %v 被用于记录是服务请求的虚拟主机的名称。然后，可以使用诸如split-logfile之类的程序对访问日志进行后处理，以便将其分为每个虚拟主机一个文件。

trans-unit.source: The %{ENV:variable} form of TestString in the RewriteCond allows mod_rewrite's rewrite engine to make decisions conditional on environment variables. Note that the variables accessible in mod_rewrite without the ENV: prefix are not actually environment variables. Rather, they are variables special to mod_rewrite which cannot be accessed from other modules.
trans-unit.target: 在 %{ENV:variable} 的形式的TestString中 RewriteCond 允许 mod_rewrite 的重写引擎，使在环境变量有条件的决定。请注意，在 mod_rewrite 中不带 ENV: 前缀的可访问变量实际上不是环境变量。相反，它们是 mod_rewrite 专用的变量，无法从其他模块访问。

trans-unit.source: The <Else> applies the enclosed directives if and only if the most recent <If> or <ElseIf> section in the same scope has not been applied. For example: In
trans-unit.target: 所述 <Else> 如果仅仅如果最近的和适用封闭指令 <If> 或 <ElseIf> 尚未应用于在同一范围内部。例如：

trans-unit.source: The <ElseIf> applies the enclosed directives if and only if both the given condition evaluates to true and the most recent <If> or <ElseIf> section in the same scope has not been applied. For example: In
trans-unit.target: 所述 <ElseIf> 如果仅当两者给定的条件评估为真，并且最近应用于封闭指令 <If> 或 <ElseIf> 尚未应用于在同一范围内部。例如：

trans-unit.source: The <ElseIf> would match if the remote address of a request belongs to the subnet 10.0.0.0/8 but not to the subnet 10.1.0.0/16.
trans-unit.target: 如果请求的远程地址属于子网10.0.0.0/8但不属于子网10.1.0.0/16 ，则 <ElseIf> 将匹配。

trans-unit.source: The <Files> directive limits the scope of the enclosed directives by filename. It is comparable to the <Directory> and <Location> directives. It should be matched with a </Files> directive. The directives given within this section will be applied to any object with a basename (last component of filename) matching the specified filename. <Files> sections are processed in the order they appear in the configuration file, after the <Directory> sections and .htaccess files are read, but before <Location> sections. Note that <Files> can be nested inside <Directory> sections to restrict the portion of the filesystem they apply to.
trans-unit.target: 所述 <Files> 指令限制在由filename封闭指令范围。它与 <Directory> 和 <Location> 指令可比。它应该与 </Files> 指令匹配。本节中给出的指令将应用于具有与指定文件名匹配的基本名（文件名的最后一个组成部分）的任何对象。在读取 <Directory> 节和 .htaccess 文件之后，但在 <Location> 节之前，按照在配置文件中出现的顺序处理 <Files> >节。请注意， <Files> 可以嵌套在 <Directory> 部分以限制它们适用于文件系统的一部分。

trans-unit.source: The <FilesMatch> directive limits the scope of the enclosed directives by filename, just as the <Files> directive does. However, it accepts a regular expression. For example:
trans-unit.target: 就像 <Files> 指令一样， <FilesMatch> 指令通过文件名限制了封闭指令的范围。但是，它接受正则表达式。例如：

trans-unit.source: The <If> directive evaluates an expression at runtime, and applies the enclosed directives if and only if the expression evaluates to true. For example:
trans-unit.target: 所述 <If> 指令计算一个在运行时表达式，并适用封闭指令当且仅当该表达式评估为真。例如：

trans-unit.source: The <If> would match HTTP/1.0 requests without a Host: header and the <Else> would match requests with a Host: header.
trans-unit.target: 所述 <If> 将匹配HTTP / 1.0的请求，而不一个 Host: 头和 <Else> 将匹配请求与 Host: 报头。

trans-unit.source: The <IfDefine test>...</IfDefine> section is used to mark directives that are conditional. The directives within an <IfDefine> section are only processed if the test is true. If test is false, everything between the start and end markers is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 所述 <IfDefine test>...</IfDefine> 部分用于标记指令是有条件的。 <IfDefine> 节中的指令仅在 test 为true 时才处理。如果 test 为假，则忽略开始标记和结束标记之间的所有内容。

trans-unit.source: The <IfDirective test>...</IfDirective> section is used to mark directives that are conditional on the presence of a specific directive. The directives within an <IfDirective> section are only processed if the test is true. If test is false, everything between the start and end markers is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 所述 <IfDirective test>...</IfDirective> 部分用于标记指示是在一个特定的指令的存在为条件。 <IfDirective> 部分中的指令仅在 test 为true 时才处理。如果 test 为假，则忽略开始标记和结束标记之间的所有内容。

trans-unit.source: The <IfFile filename>...</IfFile> section is used to mark directives that are conditional on the existence of a file on disk. The directives within an <IfFile> section are only processed if filename exists. If filename doesn't exist, everything between the start and end markers is ignored. filename can be an absolute path or a path relative to the server root.
trans-unit.target: 所述 <IfFile filename>...</IfFile> 部分用于标记指示是在磁盘上的文件的为条件。 <IfFile> 部分中的指令仅在 filename 存在的情况下进行处理。如果 filename 不存在，则开始标记和结束标记之间的所有内容都将被忽略。 filename 可以是绝对路径，也可以是相对于服务器根目录的路径。

trans-unit.source: The <IfModule test>...</IfModule> section is used to mark directives that are conditional on the presence of a specific module. The directives within an <IfModule> section are only processed if the test is true. If test is false, everything between the start and end markers is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 所述 <IfModule test>...</IfModule> 部分用于标记指示是在一个特定的模块的存在为条件。 <IfModule> 部分中的指令仅在 test 为true 时才处理。如果 test 为假，则忽略开始标记和结束标记之间的所有内容。

trans-unit.source: The <IfSection test>...</IfSection> section is used to mark directives that are conditional on the presence of a specific section directive. A section directive is any directive such as <VirtualHost> which encloses other directives, and has a directive name with a leading "<".
trans-unit.target: 所述 <IfSection test>...</IfSection> 部分用于标记指示是在一个特定的部分的指令的存在为条件。节指令是任何指令，例如 <VirtualHost> ，它包围其他指令，并且指令名称前带有“ <”。

trans-unit.source: The <IfVersion> section encloses configuration directives which are executed only if the httpd version matches the desired criteria. For normal (numeric) comparisons the version argument has the format major[.minor[.patch]], e.g. 2.1.0 or 2.2. minor and patch are optional. If these numbers are omitted, they are assumed to be zero. The following numerical operators are possible:
trans-unit.target: 所述 <IfVersion> 部包围仅当其被执行的配置指令 httpd 版本匹配的期望标准。对于常规（数字）比较， version 参数的格式为 major[.minor[.patch]] ，例如 2.1.0 或 2.2 。 minor 和 patch 是可选的。如果省略这些数字，则假定为零。可以使用以下数值 operator ：

trans-unit.source: The <Limit> and <LimitExcept> directives may be nested. In this case, each successive level of <Limit> or <LimitExcept> directives must further restrict the set of methods to which access controls apply.
trans-unit.target: 所述 <Limit> 和 <LimitExcept> 指令可以嵌套。在这种情况下， <Limit> 或 <LimitExcept> 指令的每个连续级别必须进一步限制访问控制所应用的方法集。

trans-unit.source: The <Location> directive limits the scope of the enclosed directives by URL. It is similar to the <Directory> directive, and starts a subsection which is terminated with a </Location> directive. <Location> sections are processed in the order they appear in the configuration file, after the <Directory> sections and .htaccess files are read, and after the <Files> sections.
trans-unit.target: 所述 <Location> 指令限制的通过URL封闭指令范围。它与 <Directory> 指令相似，并以 </Location> 指令终止的子节开始。在读取 <Directory> 节和 .htaccess 文件之后以及在 <Files> 节之后，将按 <Location> 节的顺序显示它们在配置文件中的顺序。

trans-unit.source: The <Location> functionality is especially useful when combined with the SetHandler directive. For example, to enable status requests but allow them only from browsers at example.com, you might use:
trans-unit.target: 当与 SetHandler 指令结合使用时， <Location> 功能特别有用。例如，要启用状态请求但仅允许来自 example.com 浏览器的状态请求，可以使用：

trans-unit.source: The <LocationMatch> directive limits the scope of the enclosed directives by URL, in an identical manner to <Location>. However, it takes a regular expression as an argument instead of a simple string. For example:
trans-unit.target: 所述 <LocationMatch> 指令限制由URL封闭指令所要范围内，以相同的方式 <Location> 。但是，它使用正则表达式作为参数而不是简单的字符串。例如：

trans-unit.source: The <Macro> directive controls the definition of a macro within the server runtime configuration files. The first argument is the name of the macro. Other arguments are parameters to the macro. It is good practice to prefix parameter names with any of '$%@', and not macro names with such characters.
trans-unit.target: 所述 <Macro> 指令控制的服务器运行时配置文件内的宏的定义。第一个参数是宏的名称。其他参数是宏的参数。优良作法是在参数名称前添加' $%@ ' 前缀，而不在宏名称前添加此类字符。

trans-unit.source: The <ProxyMatch> directive is identical to the <Proxy> directive, except that it matches URLs using regular expressions.
trans-unit.target: 所述 <ProxyMatch> 指令是相同的 <Proxy> 指令，不同之处在于它使用相匹配的URL 的正则表达式。

trans-unit.source: The --enable-nonportable-atomics option is relevant for the following platforms:
trans-unit.target: 该 --enable-nonportable-atomics 选项相关以下平台：

trans-unit.source: The -U operator determines whether the test string (in this case, REQUEST_URI) is a valid URL. It does this via a subrequest. In the event that this subrequest fails - that is, the requested resource doesn't exist - this rule invokes the CGI program /regenerate_page.cgi, which generates the requested resource and saves it into the document directory, so that the next time it is requested, a static copy can be served.
trans-unit.target: 所述 -U 操作者确定的测试字符串（在这种情况下，是否 REQUEST_URI ）是一个有效的URL。它通过子请求来完成。如果此子请求失败-即请求的资源不存在-该规则将调用CGI程序 /regenerate_page.cgi ，该程序将生成请求的资源并将其保存到文档目录中，以便下次使用根据要求，可以提供静态副本。

trans-unit.source: The -d switch on the command line.
trans-unit.target: 所述 -d 在命令行上开关。

trans-unit.source: The -l option tells truss to log the ID of the LWP (lightweight process--Solaris' form of kernel-level thread) that invokes each system call.
trans-unit.target: 在 -l 选项告诉桁架记录的LWP的ID -调用每个系统调用（轻量进程内核级线程的Solaris的形式）。

trans-unit.source: The .+ at the start of the regex ensures that files named .png, or .gif, for example, are not matched.
trans-unit.target: 正则表达式开头的 .+ 可确保不匹配名为 .png 或 .gif 的文件。

trans-unit.source: The .dsp project files are distributed in Visual Studio 6.0 (98) format. Visual C++ 5.0 (97) will recognize them. Visual Studio 2002 (.NET) and later users must convert Apache.dsw plus the .dsp files into an Apache.sln plus .msproj files. Be sure you reconvert the .msproj file again if its source .dsp file changes! This is really trivial, just open Apache.dsw in the VC++ 7.0 IDE once again and reconvert.
trans-unit.target: 该 .dsp 项目文件分布在Visual Studio 6.0（98）格式。 Visual C ++ 5.0（97）将识别它们。 Visual Studio 2002（.NET）和更高版本的用户必须将 Apache.dsw 和 .dsp 文件转换为 Apache.sln 和 .msproj 文件。如果源 .dsp 文件更改，请确保再次重新转换 .msproj 文件！这真的很简单，只需在VC ++ 7.0 IDE中再次打开 Apache.dsw 并重新进行转换即可。

trans-unit.source: The AuthFormDisableNoStore flag disables the sending of a Cache-Control no-store header with the error 401 page returned when the user is not yet logged in. The purpose of the header is to make it difficult for an ecmascript application to attempt to resubmit the login form, and reveal the username and password to the backend application. Disable at your own risk.
trans-unit.target: 该 AuthFormDisableNoStore 一个的标志禁止发送 Cache-Control no-store 头与401错误页面返回当用户还没有登陆，标题的目的是使困难的 ecmascript 应用程序试图重新提交登录表单，然后向后端应用程序显示用户名和密码。禁用后果自负。

trans-unit.source: The AuthFormFakeBasicAuth flag determines whether a Basic Authentication header will be added to the request headers. This can be used to expose the username and password to an underlying application, without the underlying application having to be aware of how the login was achieved.
trans-unit.target: 所述 AuthFormFakeBasicAuth 标志确定是否一个 Basic Authentication 报头将被添加到所述请求头。这可以用于向基础应用程序公开用户名和密码，而基础应用程序不必知道如何实现登录。

trans-unit.source: The AuthFormLocation directive specifies the name of an HTML field which, if present, will contain a URL to redirect the browser to should login be successful.
trans-unit.target: 该 AuthFormLocation 指令指定的HTML字段构成，其中，如果存在的话，将包含一个URL名称将浏览器重定向到应该登录成功。

trans-unit.source: The AuthFormLoginRequiredLocation directive specifies the URL to redirect to should the user not be authorised to view a page. The value is parsed using the ap_expr parser before being sent to the client. By default, if a user is not authorised to view a page, the HTTP response code HTTP_UNAUTHORIZED will be returned with the page specified by the ErrorDocument directive. This directive overrides this default.
trans-unit.target: 该 AuthFormLoginRequiredLocation 指令指定的URL重定向到如果用户不被授权查看的页面。该值在发送给客户端之前使用ap_expr解析器进行解析。默认情况下，如果用户无权查看页面，则将与 ErrorDocument 指令指定的页面一起返回HTTP响应代码 HTTP_UNAUTHORIZED 。该指令将覆盖此默认值。

trans-unit.source: The AuthFormLoginSuccessLocation directive specifies the URL to redirect to should the user have logged in successfully. The value is parsed using the ap_expr parser before being sent to the client. This directive can be overridden if a form field has been defined containing another URL using the AuthFormLocation directive.
trans-unit.target: 该 AuthFormLoginSuccessLocation 指令指定的URL重定向到如果用户已成功登录。该值在发送给客户端之前使用ap_expr解析器进行解析。如果使用 AuthFormLocation 指令定义了包含另一个URL的表单字段，则可以覆盖此指令。

trans-unit.source: The AuthFormLogoutLocation directive specifies the URL of a page on the server to redirect to should the user attempt to log out. The value is parsed using the ap_expr parser before being sent to the client.
trans-unit.target: 该 AuthFormLogoutLocation 指令指定服务器上的网页的URL重定向到如果用户试图注销。该值在发送给客户端之前使用ap_expr解析器进行解析。

trans-unit.source: The AuthFormMethod directive specifies the name of an HTML field which, if present, will contain the method of the request to to submit should login be successful.
trans-unit.target: 该 AuthFormMethod 指令指定的HTML字段，如果存在，将包含请求的方法来提交应该登录成功的名称。

trans-unit.source: The AuthFormMethod directive specifies the name of an HTML field which, if present, will contain the mimetype of the request to submit should login be successful.
trans-unit.target: AuthFormMethod 指令指定HTML字段的名称（如果存在），它将包含登录成功后要提交的请求的模仿类型。

trans-unit.source: The AuthFormPassword directive specifies the name of an HTML field which, if present, will contain the password to be used to log in.
trans-unit.target: 该 AuthFormPassword 被用来登录的HTML字段，如果存在，将包含密码的指令指定的名称。

trans-unit.source: The AuthFormSitePassphrase directive specifies a passphrase which, if present in the user session, causes Apache httpd to bypass authentication checks for the given URL. It can be used on high traffic websites to reduce the load induced on authentication infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: 所述 AuthFormSitePassphrase 指令指定一个密码，如果存在于用户会话，使阿帕奇的httpd到对于给定的URL旁路认证检查。它可以用于高流量的网站，以减轻身份验证基础结构带来的负担。

trans-unit.source: The AuthFormSize directive specifies the maximum size of the body of the request that will be parsed to find the login form.
trans-unit.target: 该 AuthFormSize 指令指定将被解析，找到登录表单的请求主体的最大尺寸。

trans-unit.source: The AuthFormUsername directive specifies the name of an HTML field which, if present, will contain the username to be used to log in.
trans-unit.target: 该 AuthFormUsername 被用来登录的HTML字段，如果存在，将包含用户名的指令指定的名称。

trans-unit.source: The AuthMerging directive can be used to control how authorization configuration sections are merged.
trans-unit.target: 该 AuthMerging 指令可以用来控制授权构成部分如何合并。

trans-unit.source: The BufferSize directive specifies the amount of data in bytes that will be buffered before being read from or written to each request. The default is 128 kilobytes.
trans-unit.target: 该 BufferSize 指令指定将从被读取或写入到每一个请求之前被缓冲的以字节为单位的数据量。默认值为128 KB。

trans-unit.source: The CacheFile directive of mod_file_cache opens an active handle or file descriptor to the file (or files) listed in the configuration directive and places these open file handles in the cache. When the file is requested, the server retrieves the handle from the cache and passes it to the sendfile() (or TransmitFile() on Windows), socket API.
trans-unit.target: mod_file_cache 的 CacheFile 伪指令为配置伪指令中列出的一个或多个文件打开活动句柄或文件描述符，并将这些打开的文件句柄放置在缓存中。当请求文件时，服务器从缓存中检索该句柄，并将其传递给 sendfile() （或Windows上的 TransmitFile() ），套接字API。

trans-unit.source: The CacheQuickHandler directive controls the phase in which the cache is handled.
trans-unit.target: 该 CacheQuickHandler 指令控制在高速缓存处理的阶段。

trans-unit.source: The ExpiresDefault and ExpiresByType directives can also be defined in a more readable syntax of the form:
trans-unit.target: 的 ExpiresDefault 和 ExpiresByType 指令也可以以以下形式的更可读的语法定义的：

trans-unit.source: The FilterDeclare directive declares a filter, assigning it a name and filter type. Required only if the filter is not the default type AP_FTYPE_RESOURCE.
trans-unit.target: 该 FilterDeclare 指令声明一个过滤器，分配给它一个名称和过滤器类型。仅当过滤器不是默认类型AP_FTYPE_RESOURCE时才需要。

trans-unit.source: The FilterProvider directive has changed from httpd 2.2: the match and dispatch arguments are replaced with a single but more versatile expression. In general, you can convert a match/dispatch pair to the two sides of an expression, using something like:
trans-unit.target: 从httpd 2.2开始， FilterProvider 指令已更改：用单个但更通用的 expression 替换 match 和 dispatch 参数。通常，您可以使用以下方法将匹配/发送对转换为表达式的两侧：

trans-unit.source: The FilterProvider directive registers a provider with a filter. The filter may have been declared with FilterDeclare; if not, FilterProvider will implicitly declare it with the default type AP_FTYPE_RESOURCE. The provider must have been registered with ap_register_output_filter by some module. The final argument to FilterProvider is an expression: the provider will be selected to run for a request if and only if the expression evaluates to true. The expression may evaluate HTTP request or response headers, environment variables, or the Handler used by this request. Unlike earlier versions, mod_filter now supports complex expressions involving multiple criteria with AND / OR logic (&& / ||) and brackets. The details of the expression syntax are described in the ap_expr documentation.
trans-unit.target: 该 FilterProvider 指令寄存器带有过滤器的供应商。过滤器可能已经用 FilterDeclare 声明了；如果不是，FilterProvider将使用默认类型AP_FTYPE_RESOURCE隐式声明它。提供程序必须已通过某个模块在 ap_register_output_filter 中注册。 FilterProvider 的最后一个参数是一个表达式：当且仅当表达式的计算结果为true时，才会选择提供程序来运行请求。该表达式可以求值HTTP请求或响应标头，环境变量或此请求使用的处理程序。与早期版本不同，mod_filter现在支持复杂的表达式，该表达式涉及多个条件，并带有AND / OR逻辑（&& / ||）和方括号。表达式语法的详细信息在ap_expr文档中进行了描述。

trans-unit.source: The Include directive will fail with an error if a wildcard expression does not match any file. The IncludeOptional directive can be used if non-matching wildcards should be ignored.
trans-unit.target: 在 Include 指令将失败，错误，如果一个通配符表达式不匹配的任何文件。该 IncludeOptional 可用于指示，如果不匹配的通配符应该被忽略。

trans-unit.source: The include virtual element should be used in preference to exec cgi. In particular, if you need to pass additional arguments to a CGI program, using the query string, this cannot be done with exec cgi, but can be done with include virtual, as shown here:
trans-unit.target: 在 include virtual 单元应当优先于使用 exec cgi 。特别是，如果您需要使用查询字符串将其他参数传递给CGI程序，则不能使用 exec cgi 来完成，而可以使用 include virtual 来完成，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: The MMapFile directive of mod_file_cache maps a list of statically configured files into memory through the system call mmap(). This system call is available on most modern Unix derivatives, but not on all. There are sometimes system-specific limits on the size and number of files that can be mmap()ed, experimentation is probably the easiest way to find out.
trans-unit.target: mod_file_cache 的 MMapFile 指令通过系统调用 mmap() 将静态配置的文件列表映射到内存中。大多数现代的Unix派生版本都可以使用此系统调用，但并非全部都可用。有时对系统的大小和数量有特定于系统的限制，可以限制 mmap() 的文件大小，而实验可能是找出问题的最简单方法。

trans-unit.source: The ProxyRequests directive should usually be set off when using ProxyPass.
trans-unit.target: 在 ProxyRequests 指令通常应设置关闭使用时 ProxyPass 。

trans-unit.source: The Redirect directives are used to instruct clients to make a new request with a different URL. They are often used when a resource has moved to a new location.
trans-unit.target: 该 Redirect 指令用于指示客户透过不同的URL的新请求。当资源移至新位置时，通常会使用它们。

trans-unit.source: The RemoteIPHeader directive triggers mod_remoteip to treat the value of the specified header-field header as the useragent IP address, or list of intermediate useragent IP addresses, subject to further configuration of the RemoteIPInternalProxy and RemoteIPTrustedProxy directives. Unless these other directives are used, mod_remoteip will trust all hosts presenting a RemoteIPHeader IP value.
trans-unit.target: 所述 RemoteIPHeader 指令触发器 mod_remoteip 治疗指定的值 header-field 标头，如用户代理的IP地址，或用户代理中间IP地址的列表，受的进一步的配置 RemoteIPInternalProxy 和 RemoteIPTrustedProxy 指令。除非使用这些其他指令， mod_remoteip 将信任所有提供 RemoteIPHeader IP值的主机。

trans-unit.source: The RemoteIPInternalProxy directive adds one or more addresses (or address blocks) to trust as presenting a valid RemoteIPHeader value of the useragent IP. Unlike the RemoteIPTrustedProxy directive, any IP address presented in this header, including private intranet addresses, are trusted when passed from these proxies.
trans-unit.target: 该 RemoteIPInternalProxy 指令添加一个或多个地址（或地址块），以信任，呈现用户代理IP的有效RemoteIPHeader值。与 RemoteIPTrustedProxy 指令不同，从这些代理服务器传递时，此标头中提供的任何IP地址（包括专用Intranet地址）都是受信任的。

trans-unit.source: The RemoteIPInternalProxyList directive specifies a file parsed at startup, and builds a list of addresses (or address blocks) to trust as presenting a valid RemoteIPHeader value of the useragent IP.
trans-unit.target: 该 RemoteIPInternalProxyList 指令指定在启动时解析的文件，并建立地址（或地址块）的列表，以信任，呈现用户代理IP的有效RemoteIPHeader值。

trans-unit.source: The RemoteIPProxiesHeader directive specifies a header into which mod_remoteip will collect a list of all of the intermediate client IP addresses trusted to resolve the useragent IP of the request. Note that intermediate RemoteIPTrustedProxy addresses are recorded in this header, while any intermediate RemoteIPInternalProxy addresses are discarded.
trans-unit.target: 该 RemoteIPProxiesHeader 指令指定一个头成 mod_remoteip 将收集所有的中间客户端IP地址的列表信任解析请求的用户代理IP。请注意，中间 RemoteIPTrustedProxy 地址记录在此标头中，而任何中间 RemoteIPInternalProxy 地址都将被丢弃。

trans-unit.source: The RemoteIPTrustedProxy directive adds one or more addresses (or address blocks) to trust as presenting a valid RemoteIPHeader value of the useragent IP. Unlike the RemoteIPInternalProxy directive, any intranet or private IP address reported by such proxies, including the 10/8, 172.16/12, 192.168/16, 169.254/16 and 127/8 blocks (or outside of the IPv6 public 2000::/3 block) are not trusted as the useragent IP, and are left in the RemoteIPHeader header's value.
trans-unit.target: 该 RemoteIPTrustedProxy 指令添加一个或多个地址（或地址块），以信任，呈现用户代理IP的有效RemoteIPHeader值。与 RemoteIPInternalProxy 指令不同，此类代理报告的任何Intranet或私有IP地址，包括10 / 8、172.16 / 12、192.168 / 16、169.254 / 16和127/8块（或在IPv6公用2000 :: / 3外部）不被信任为用户代理IP，而是保留在 RemoteIPHeader 标头的值中。

trans-unit.source: The RemoteIPTrustedProxyList directive specifies a file parsed at startup, and builds a list of addresses (or address blocks) to trust as presenting a valid RemoteIPHeader value of the useragent IP.
trans-unit.target: 该 RemoteIPTrustedProxyList 指令指定在启动时解析的文件，并建立地址（或地址块）的列表，以信任，呈现用户代理IP的有效RemoteIPHeader值。

trans-unit.source: The SSILastModified directive takes precedence over the XBitHack directive when SSILastModified is set to on.
trans-unit.target: 当 SSILastModified 设置为 on 时， SSILastModified 指令优先于 XBitHack 指令。

trans-unit.source: The UndefMacro directive is used so that later macros using the same variable names don't result in conflicting definitions.
trans-unit.target: 使用 UndefMacro 指令，以便以后使用相同变量名的宏不会导致定义冲突。

trans-unit.source: The <If> directive, added in 2.4, replaces many things that mod_rewrite has traditionally been used to do, and you should probably look there first before resorting to mod_rewrite.
trans-unit.target: 在2.4中添加的 <If> 指令替代了传统上使用 mod_rewrite 进行的许多操作，在使用mod_rewrite之前，您应该首先查看那里。

trans-unit.source: The KeepAliveTimeout directive may be also lowered on sites that are subject to DoS attacks. Some sites even turn off the keepalives completely via KeepAlive, which has of course other drawbacks on performance.
trans-unit.target: 在遭受DoS攻击的站点上，还可以降低 KeepAliveTimeout 指令。有些站点甚至通过 KeepAlive 完全关闭了keepalive ，这当然在性能上还有其他缺点。

trans-unit.source: The Mutex directive can be used to change the mutex implementation of the mpm-accept mutex at run-time. Special considerations for different mutex implementations are documented with that directive.
trans-unit.target: 该 Mutex 指令可以用来改变互斥执行的 mpm-accept 在运行时互斥。该指令记录了不同互斥量实现的特殊注意事项。

trans-unit.source: The ServerName directive may appear anywhere within the definition of a server. However, each appearance overrides the previous appearance (within that server). If no ServerName is specified, the server attempts to deduce it from the server's IP address.
trans-unit.target: 该 ServerName 指令可能会出现一个服务器的定义内的任何地方。但是，每个外观都会覆盖先前的外观（在该服务器内）。如果未指定 ServerName ，则服务器将尝试从服务器的IP地址推导出该名称。

trans-unit.source: The TimeOut directive should be lowered on sites that are subject to DoS attacks. Setting this to as low as a few seconds may be appropriate. As TimeOut is currently used for several different operations, setting it to a low value introduces problems with long running CGI scripts.
trans-unit.target: 在遭受DoS攻击的站点上，应该降低 TimeOut 指令。将其设置为低至几秒钟可能是适当的。由于 TimeOut 当前用于几种不同的操作，因此将其设置为较低的值会导致长时间运行的CGI脚本出现问题。
