trans-unit.source: The event MPM is threaded like the Worker MPM, but is designed to allow more requests to be served simultaneously by passing off some processing work to supporting threads, freeing up the main threads to work on new requests.
trans-unit.target: 该 event MPM螺纹状的工人MPM，而是被设计成允许通过传递了一些处理工作的支撑线，以便释放主线程在新的工作要求同时服务更多的请求。

trans-unit.source: The Allow, Deny, and Order directives, provided by mod_access_compat, are deprecated and will go away in a future version. You should avoid using them, and avoid outdated tutorials recommending their use.
trans-unit.target: mod_access_compat 提供的 Allow ， Deny 和 Order 指令已被弃用，并且在以后的版本中将消失。您应该避免使用它们，并避免推荐使用过时的教程。

trans-unit.source: The Alias directive provides mapping from a URI to a directory - usually a directory outside of your DocumentRoot. Although it is possible to perform this mapping with mod_rewrite, Alias is the preferred method, for reasons of simplicity and performance.
trans-unit.target: 该 Alias 指令提供了从URI的映射到一个目录-通常是你的目录以外 DocumentRoot 。尽管可以使用 mod_rewrite 执行此映射，但是出于简单性和性能的考虑， Alias 是首选方法。

trans-unit.source: The ScriptAlias directive looks like:
trans-unit.target: 该 ScriptAlias 指令,指令的样子：

trans-unit.source: The ScriptAlias directive tells Apache that a particular directory is set aside for CGI programs. Apache will assume that every file in this directory is a CGI program, and will attempt to execute it, when that particular resource is requested by a client.
trans-unit.target: 该 ScriptAlias 指令告诉Apache特定目录中的CGI程序。Apache将假定此目录中的每个文件都是CGI程序，并在客户端请求该特定资源时尝试执行该文件。

trans-unit.source: The mod_auth_basic method is generally required when the certificates are completely arbitrary, or when their DNs have no common fields (usually the organisation, etc.). In this case, you should establish a password database containing all clients allowed, as follows:
trans-unit.target: 所述 mod_auth_basic 当证书是完全任意的方法一般是需要的，或当它们的DNS没有共同的字段（通常是组织，等等）。在这种情况下，您应该建立一个密码数据库，其中包含所有允许的客户端，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: The AuthBasicProvider is, in this case, optional, since file is the default value for this directive. You'll need to use this directive if you are choosing a different source for authentication, such as mod_authn_dbm or mod_authn_dbd.
trans-unit.target: 该 AuthBasicProvider 是，在这种情况下，可选的，因为 file 是这个指令的默认值。如果您选择其他身份验证源，例如 mod_authn_dbm 或 mod_authn_dbd ，则需要使用此伪指令。

trans-unit.source: The AuthName directive sets the
trans-unit.target: 该 AuthName 指令指令集

trans-unit.source: The AuthUserFile directive sets the path to the password file that we just created with htpasswd. If you have a large number of users, it can be quite slow to search through a plain text file to authenticate the user on each request. Apache also has the ability to store user information in fast database files. The mod_authn_dbm module provides the AuthDBMUserFile directive. These files can be created and manipulated with the dbmmanage and htdbm programs. Many other types of authentication options are available from third party modules in the Apache Modules Database.
trans-unit.target: 该 AuthUserFile 伪指令设置，我们只是创建的路径到密码文件 htpasswd 的。如果您有大量用户，则在纯文本文件中进行搜索以根据每个请求对用户进行身份验证可能会非常慢。 Apache还具有将用户信息存储在快速数据库文件中的能力。该 mod_authn_dbm 模块提供 AuthDBMUserFile 指令。可以使用 dbmmanage 和 htdbm 程序创建和操纵这些文件。Apache模块数据库中的第三方模块提供了许多其他类型的身份验证选项。

trans-unit.source: The AuthUserFile directive sets the path to the password file that we just created with htpasswd. If you have a large number of users, it can be quite slow to search through a plain text file to authenticate the user on each request. Apache also has the ability to store user information in fast database files. The mod_authn_dbm module provides the AuthDBMUserFile directive. These files can be created and manipulated with the dbmmanage and htdbm programs. Many other types of authentication options are available from third party modules in the Apache Modules Database.

The Require provides a variety of different ways to allow or deny access to resources. In conjunction with the RequireAll, RequireAny, and RequireNone directives, these requirements may be combined in arbitrarily complex ways, to enforce whatever your access policy happens to be.
trans-unit.target: 该 Require 提供各种不同的方式来允许或拒绝对资源的访问。结合使用 RequireAll ， RequireAny 和 RequireNone 指令，可以以任意复杂的方式组合这些要求，以强制执行您的访问策略。

trans-unit.source: The ProxyPass directive specifies the mapping of incoming requests to the backend server (or a cluster of servers known as a Balancer group). The simpliest example proxies all requests ("/") to a single backend:
trans-unit.target: 所述 ProxyPass 指令指定的传入请求到后端服务器（或已知为服务器集群的映射 Balancer 组）。最简单的示例将所有请求（ "/" ）代理到单个后端：

trans-unit.source: The RequestReadTimeout directive allows to limit the time a client may take to send the request.
trans-unit.target: 该 RequestReadTimeout 指令允许以限制客户机可能需要发送请求的时间。

trans-unit.source: The RewriteCond directive captures the last portion of the hostname of the requesting client - the country code - and the following RewriteRule uses that value to look up the appropriate mirror host in the map file.
trans-unit.target: 该 RewriteCond 指令捕捉请求的客户端的主机名的最后一个部分-以下重写规则使用该值来查找地图文件中的相应镜主机和-国家代码。

trans-unit.source: The RewriteMap directive can occur more than once. For each mapping-function use one RewriteMap directive to declare its rewriting mapfile.
trans-unit.target: 该 RewriteMap 指令可以出现指令不止一次。对于每个映射函数，使用一个 RewriteMap 指令声明其重写映射文件。

trans-unit.source: The RewriteMap directive defines an external function which can be called in the context of RewriteRule or RewriteCond directives to perform rewriting that is too complicated, or too specialized to be performed just by regular expressions. The source of this lookup can be any of the types listed in the sections below, and enumerated in the RewriteMap reference documentation.
trans-unit.target: 所述 RewriteMap 指令指令定义可以在的上下文中调用的外部函数 RewriteRule 或 RewriteCond 指令来执行重写是太复杂，或过专用于只由正则表达式来执行。查找的来源可以是以下各节中列出的任何类型，并且可以在 RewriteMap 参考文档中枚举。

trans-unit.source: The RewriteMap directive may not be used in <Directory> sections or .htaccess files. You must declare the map in server or virtualhost context. You may use the map, once created, in your RewriteRule and RewriteCond directives in those scopes. You just can't declare it in those scopes.
trans-unit.target: 所述 RewriteMap 指令指令可能不被使用 <Directory> 段或 .htaccess 文件。您必须在服务器或虚拟主机上下文中声明映射。您可以在这些作用域的 RewriteRule 和 RewriteCond 指令中使用映射（一旦创建）。您只是不能在这些范围内声明它。

trans-unit.source: The RewriteMap directive provides a way to call an external function, so to speak, to do your rewriting for you. This is discussed in greater detail in the RewriteMap supplementary documentation.
trans-unit.target: 该 RewriteMap 指令指令规定的方式来调用外部函数，可以这么说，做你重写你。RewriteMap补充文档中对此进行了更详细的讨论。

trans-unit.source: The RewriteRule directives are used to make sure that a client which sent a correct Host: header can use both URL variants, i.e., with or without URL prefix.
trans-unit.target: 该 RewriteRule 指令用于确保发出了一个正确的客户端 Host: 头可以同时使用网址变体，即，有或没有网址前缀。

trans-unit.source: The LoadModule directives for the chosen modules will be automatically generated in the main configuration file. By default, all those directives will be commented out except for the modules that are either required or explicitly selected by a configure --enable-foo argument. You can change the set of loaded modules by activating or deactivating the LoadModule directives in httpd.conf. In addition the LoadModule directives for all built modules can be activated via the configure option --enable-load-all-modules.
trans-unit.target: 所选模块的 LoadModule 指令将在主配置文件中自动生成。默认情况下，所有这些指令都将被注释掉，但配置 --enable-foo 参数必需或显式选择的模块除外。您可以通过激活或取消激活 httpd.conf 中的 LoadModule 指令来更改已加载模块的集合。另外，可以通过配置选项 --enable-load-all-modules 激活所有已构建模块的 LoadModule 指令。

trans-unit.source: The SSLCipherSuite needs to be configured with a strong TLS cipher suite. The current version of mod_http2 does not enforce any cipher but most clients do so. Pointing a browser to a h2 enabled server with a inappropriate cipher suite will force it to simply refuse and fall back to HTTP 1.1. This is a common mistake that is done while configuring httpd for HTTP/2 the first time, so please keep it in mind to avoid long debugging sessions! If you want to be sure about the cipher suite to choose please avoid the ones listed in the HTTP/2 TLS blacklist.
trans-unit.target: 该 SSLCipherSuite 需要具有较强的TLS加密套件进行配置。当前版本的 mod_http2 不会实施任何密码，但是大多数客户端会这样做。将浏览器指向具有不正确密码套件的启用 h2 的服务器，将迫使其仅拒绝并退回到HTTP 1.1。这是第一次为HTTP / 2配置httpd时常犯的错误，因此请记住这一点，以避免长时间的调试会话！如果您想确定选择的密码套件，请避免使用HTTP / 2 TLS黑名单中列出的密码套件。

trans-unit.source: The UserDir directive can be used to redirect user directory requests to external URLs.
trans-unit.target: 该 UserDir 指令可以用来重定向用户目录请求外部URL。

trans-unit.source: The UserDir directive specifies a directory out of which per-user content is loaded. This directive may take several different forms.
trans-unit.target: 所述 UserDir 指令指定其中每个用户的内容被加载的目录进行。该指令可以采用几种不同的形式。

trans-unit.source: The prefork MPM uses multiple child processes with one thread each. Each process handles one connection at a time. On many systems, prefork is comparable in speed to worker, but it uses more memory. Prefork's threadless design has advantages over worker in some situations: it can be used with non-thread-safe third-party modules, and it is easier to debug on platforms with poor thread debugging support.
trans-unit.target: 该 prefork 的 MPM使用多个子进程，每个一个线程。每个进程一次处理一个连接。在许多系统上，prefork的速度可与worker媲美，但是它使用更多的内存。在某些情况下，Prefork的无线程设计具有优于worker的优点：它可以与非线程安全的第三方模块一起使用，并且在具有较差的线程调试支持的平台上调试起来更容易。

trans-unit.source: The worker MPM uses multiple child processes with many threads each. Each thread handles one connection at a time. Worker generally is a good choice for high-traffic servers because it has a smaller memory footprint than the prefork MPM.
trans-unit.target: 该 worker MPM使用多个子进程，每个许多线程。每个线程一次处理一个连接。对于高流量服务器，工作者通常是一个不错的选择，因为它的内存占用空间比前叉MPM小。

trans-unit.source: The htcacheclean tool is provided to list cached URLs, remove cached URLs, or to maintain the size of the disk cache within size and/or inode limits. The tool can be run on demand, or can be daemonized to offer continuous monitoring of directory sizes.
trans-unit.target: 所述 htcacheclean 工具被提供给高速缓存的列表的URL，删除高速缓存的URL，或以维持尺寸和/或索引节点的限度内磁盘高速缓存的大小。该工具可以按需运行，也可以守护程序提供对目录大小的连续监视。

trans-unit.source: The event Multi-Processing Module (MPM) is designed to allow more requests to be served simultaneously by passing off some processing work to the listeners threads, freeing up the worker threads to serve new requests.
trans-unit.target: 该 event 多处理模块（MPM）的目的是为了让更多的请求通过传递了一些处理工作听众线程，释放工作线程来服务新的请求，同时提供服务。

trans-unit.source: The AllowOverride directive works only in <Directory> sections.
trans-unit.target: 该 AllowOverride 指令只能出现在 <Directory> 部分。

trans-unit.source: The <Directory> and <Files> directives, along with their regex counterparts, apply directives to parts of the filesystem. Directives enclosed in a <Directory> section apply to the named filesystem directory and all subdirectories of that directory (as well as the files in those directories). The same effect can be obtained using .htaccess files. For example, in the following configuration, directory indexes will be enabled for the /var/web/dir1 directory and all subdirectories.
trans-unit.target: 该 <Directory> 和 <Files> 的指令，与他们一起的正则表达式的同行，应用指令到文件系统的组成部分。 <Directory> 部分中包含的指令适用于命名的文件系统目录以及该目录的所有子目录（以及这些目录中的文件）。使用.htaccess文件可以获得相同的效果。例如，在以下配置中，将为 /var/web/dir1 目录和所有子目录启用目录索引。

trans-unit.source: The <Directory>, <Files>, and <Location> directives can each use shell-style wildcard characters as in fnmatch from the C standard library. The character "*" matches any sequence of characters, "?" matches any single character, and "[seq]" matches any character in seq. The "/" character will not be matched by any wildcard; it must be specified explicitly.
trans-unit.target: 所述 <Directory> ， <Files> ，和 <Location> 指令可以在每次使用壳式通配符作为 fnmatch 从C标准库。字符“ *”与任何字符序列“？”匹配 匹配任何单个字符，而“[ SEQ ]”中的任何字符匹配SEQ。“ /”字符不会与任何通配符匹配；必须明确指定。

trans-unit.source: The DocumentRoot directive is set in your main server configuration file (httpd.conf) and, possibly, once per additional Virtual Host you create.
trans-unit.target: 该 DocumentRoot 的指令在主服务器配置文件（设置 httpd.conf 文件），可能的话，每增加一次虚拟主机创建。

trans-unit.source: The DocumentRoot of the current vhost
trans-unit.target: 当前虚拟主机的 DocumentRoot

trans-unit.source: The <If> directive change the configuration depending on a condition which can be expressed by a boolean expression. For example, the following configuration denies access if the HTTP Referer header does not start with "http://www.example.com/".
trans-unit.target: 所述 <If> 指令的变化，这取决于可以由布尔表达式表示的条件的配置。例如，如果HTTP Referer标头不是以“ http://www.example.com/”开头，则以下配置拒绝访问。

trans-unit.source: The <IfDefine> directive encloses directives that will only be applied if an appropriate parameter is defined on the httpd command line. For example, with the following configuration, all requests will be redirected to another site only if the server is started using httpd -DClosedForNow:
trans-unit.target: 所述 <IfDefine> 配置指令包围指令，如果适当的参数是定义将只应用于 httpd 的命令行。例如，使用以下配置，仅当使用 httpd -DClosedForNow 启动服务器时，所有请求才会重定向到另一个站点：

trans-unit.source: The <IfModule> directive is very similar, except it encloses directives that will only be applied if a particular module is available in the server. The module must either be statically compiled in the server, or it must be dynamically compiled and its LoadModule line must be earlier in the configuration file. This directive should only be used if you need your configuration file to work whether or not certain modules are installed. It should not be used to enclose directives that you want to work all the time, because it can suppress useful error messages about missing modules.
trans-unit.target: 所述 <IfModule> 配置指令是非常相似的，除了它包围如果一个特定的模块是在服务器中可用，将只应用于指令。该模块必须在服务器中静态编译，或者必须动态编译，并且其 LoadModule 行必须在配置文件中更早。无论是否安装了某些模块，仅在需要配置文件才能工作时，才应使用此伪指令。不应将其用于始终包含要使用的指令，因为它可以抑制有关缺少模块的有用错误消息。

trans-unit.source: The <Location> directive and its regex counterpart, on the other hand, change the configuration for content in the webspace. For example, the following configuration prevents access to any URL-path that begins in /private. In particular, it will apply to requests for http://yoursite.example.com/private, http://yoursite.example.com/private123, and http://yoursite.example.com/private/dir/file.html as well as any other requests starting with the /private string.
trans-unit.target: 所述 <Location> 指令和它的正则表达式的对应，在另一方面，改变在网页空间内容的配置。例如，以下配置阻止访问任何以/ private开头的URL路径。特别是，它适用于对请求 http://yoursite.example.com/private ， http://yoursite.example.com/private123 和 http://yoursite.example.com/private/dir/file.html 以及其他以 /private 字符串开头的请求。

trans-unit.source: The <Location> directive need not have anything to do with the filesystem. For example, the following example shows how to map a particular URL to an internal Apache HTTP Server handler provided by mod_status. No file called server-status needs to exist in the filesystem.
trans-unit.target: 该 <Location> 指令需要没有什么可以做的文件系统。例如，以下示例显示如何将特定URL映射到 mod_status 提供的内部Apache HTTP Server处理程序。文件系统中无需存在称为 server-status 的文件。

trans-unit.source: The LogLevel directive allows you to specify a log severity level on a per-module basis. In this way, if you are troubleshooting a problem with just one particular module, you can turn up its logging volume without also getting the details of other modules that you're not interested in. This is particularly useful for modules such as mod_proxy or mod_rewrite where you want to know details about what it's trying to do.
trans-unit.target: 该 LogLevel 的指令允许你指定在每个模块日志级别。这样，如果您仅对一个特定模块的问题进行故障排除，则可以在不获取您不感兴趣的其他模块的详细信息的情况下提高其日志记录量。这对于诸如 mod_proxy 或 mod_rewrite 之类的模块特别有用您想知道有关它要执行的操作的详细信息。

trans-unit.source: The Options directive cannot be used in <Files> and <FilesMatch> sections.
trans-unit.target: 该 Options 指令不能被使用 <Files> 和 <FilesMatch> 段。

trans-unit.source: The ServerAdmin and ServerTokens directives control what information about the server will be presented in server-generated documents such as error messages. The ServerTokens directive sets the value of the Server HTTP response header field.
trans-unit.target: 该 ServerAdmin 和 ServerTokens 指令控制哪些服务器的相关信息将在服务器生成的文档，如错误信息呈现。所述 ServerTokens 指令设置服务器HTTP响应报头字段的值。

trans-unit.source: The ServerAdmin of the current vhost
trans-unit.target: 当前虚拟主机的 ServerAdmin

trans-unit.source: The ServerName of the current vhost
trans-unit.target: 当前虚拟主机的 ServerName

trans-unit.source: The ServerName, UseCanonicalName and UseCanonicalPhysicalPort directives are used by the server to determine how to construct self-referential URLs. For example, when a client requests a directory, but does not include the trailing slash in the directory name, httpd must redirect the client to the full name including the trailing slash so that the client will correctly resolve relative references in the document.
trans-unit.target: 该 ServerName ， UseCanonicalName 和 UseCanonicalPhysicalPort 指令用于服务器，以确定如何构建自引用的URL。例如，当客户端请求目录，但在目录名称中不包含斜杠时，httpd必须将客户端重定向到包含斜杠的全名，以便客户端可以正确解析文档中的相对引用。

trans-unit.source: The <VirtualHost> container encloses directives that apply to specific hosts. This is useful when serving multiple hosts from the same machine with a different configuration for each. For more information, see the Virtual Host Documentation.
trans-unit.target: 所述 <VirtualHost> 容器包围适用于特定的主机指令。当从同一台计算机为多台主机提供不同配置时，这很有用。有关更多信息，请参见《虚拟主机文档》。

trans-unit.source: The mod_authn_socache module allows the result of authentication to be cached, relieving load on authentication backends.
trans-unit.target: 所述 mod_authn_socache 模块允许认证的结果进行高速缓存，对认证后端减轻负载。

trans-unit.source: The mod_cache module hooks into the server in two possible places depending on the value of the CacheQuickHandler directive:
trans-unit.target: 该 mod_cache 的模块挂接到服务器取决于价值两种可能的地方 CacheQuickHandler 指令：

trans-unit.source: The mod_cache module relies on specific backend store implementations in order to manage the cache, and for caching to disk mod_cache_disk is provided to support this.
trans-unit.target: 该 mod_cache 的模块依赖于特定的后端存储实现以管理缓存，缓存到磁盘 mod_cache_disk 提供支持这一点。

trans-unit.source: The mod_cache_disk module makes no attempt to regulate the amount of disk space used by the cache, although it will gracefully stand down on any disk error and behave as if the cache was never present.
trans-unit.target: 尽管 mod_cache_disk 模块将优雅地站在任何磁盘错误上，并且其行为就像从未出现过高速缓存一样，但它不会尝试调节高速缓存所使用的磁盘空间量。

trans-unit.source: The SetEnv directive runs late during request processing meaning that directives such as SetEnvIf and RewriteCond will not see the variables set with it.
trans-unit.target: 该 SetEnv 指令的要求在后期运行处理这意味着指令，如 SetEnvIf 之后和 RewriteCond 不会看到它设置的变量。

trans-unit.source: The CacheFile directive instructs httpd to open the file when it is started and to re-use this file-handle for all subsequent access to this file.
trans-unit.target: 该 CacheFile 指令指示httpd的打开文件时，它启动和重新使用这个文件句柄的所有后续访问此文件。

trans-unit.source: The MMapFile directive does not keep track of how much memory it allocates, so you must ensure not to over-use the directive. Each httpd child process will replicate this memory, so it is critically important to ensure that the files mapped are not so large as to cause the system to swap memory.
trans-unit.target: 该 MMapFile 指令不跟踪它分配多少内存，所以你不能确保过度使用的指令。每个httpd子进程都会复制该内存，因此确保映射的文件不会太大而导致系统交换内存至关重要。

trans-unit.source: The Header directive can use the presence or absence of an environment variable to determine whether or not a certain HTTP header will be placed in the response to the client. This allows, for example, a certain response header to be sent only if a corresponding header is received in the request from the client.
trans-unit.target: 的 Header 指示可以使用的环境变量的存在或不存在来确定某些HTTP头是否将被放置在该响应给客户机。例如，这允许仅在从客户端的请求中接收到相应的标头时才发送特定的响应标头。

trans-unit.source: The CustomLog directive sets up a new log file using the defined nickname. The filename for the access log is relative to the ServerRoot unless it begins with a slash.
trans-unit.target: 该 CustomLog 指令建立一个新的日志文件中使用已定义的昵称。除非以斜杠开头，否则访问日志的文件名是相对于 ServerRoot 的。

trans-unit.source: The <Proxy> and <ProxyMatch> containers apply enclosed configuration directives only to sites accessed through mod_proxy's proxy server that match the specified URL. For example, the following configuration will allow only a subset of clients to access the www.example.com website using the proxy server:
trans-unit.target: 所述 <Proxy> 和 <ProxyMatch> 容器所适用封闭配置指令仅通过访问的网站 mod_proxy 匹配指定URL，它的代理服务器。例如，以下配置将仅允许一部分客户端使用代理服务器访问 www.example.com 网站：

trans-unit.source: The ProxyPass configures the server to fetch the appropriate documents, while the ProxyPassReverse directive rewrites redirects originating at internal.example.com so that they target the appropriate directory on the local server. Similarly, the ProxyPassReverseCookieDomain and ProxyPassReverseCookiePath rewrite cookies set by the backend server.
trans-unit.target: 该 ProxyPass 配置服务器，以获取相应的文件，而 ProxyPassReverse 指令在重写重定向发起 internal.example.com 让他们针对本地服务器上相应的目录。同样， ProxyPassReverseCookieDomain 和 ProxyPassReverseCookiePath 重写后端服务器设置的cookie。

trans-unit.source: The mod_ssl module uses the socache interface to provide a session cache and a stapling cache.
trans-unit.target: 该 mod_ssl 的模块使用 socache 接口方面提供了会话缓存与缝合缓存。

trans-unit.source: The <IfVersion> directive is very similar to <IfDefine> and <IfModule>, except it encloses directives that will only be applied if a particular version of the server is executing. This module is designed for the use in test suites and large networks which have to deal with different httpd versions and different configurations.
trans-unit.target: 所述 <IfVersion> 指令是非常相似的 <IfDefine> 配置和 <IfModule> 配置，除了它包围如果服务器的特定版本正在执行将只应用于指令。此模块设计用于在测试套件和大型网络中使用，这些套件必须处理不同的httpd版本和不同的配置。

trans-unit.source: The Listen directive does not implement Virtual Hosts - it only tells the main server what addresses and ports to listen on. If no <VirtualHost> directives are used, the server will behave in the same way for all accepted requests. However, <VirtualHost> can be used to specify a different behavior for one or more of the addresses or ports. To implement a VirtualHost, the server must first be told to listen to the address and port to be used. Then a <VirtualHost> section should be created for the specified address and port to set the behavior of this virtual host. Note that if the <VirtualHost> is set for an address and port that the server is not listening to, it cannot be accessed.
trans-unit.target: 在 Listen 指令不实现虚拟主机-它只是告诉主服务器的哪些地址和端口上侦听。如果未使用 <VirtualHost> 指令，则服务器对于所有接受的请求将以相同的方式运行。但是， <VirtualHost> 可用于为一个或多个地址或端口指定不同的行为。要实现VirtualHost，必须首先告知服务器监听要使用的地址和端口。然后，应为指定的地址和端口创建一个 <VirtualHost> 部分，以设置此虚拟主机的行为。请注意，如果将 <VirtualHost> 设置为服务器未监听的地址和端口，则无法访问它。

trans-unit.source: The Listen directive tells the server to accept incoming requests only on the specified port(s) or address-and-port combinations. If only a port number is specified in the Listen directive, the server listens to the given port on all interfaces. If an IP address is given as well as a port, the server will listen on the given port and interface. Multiple Listen directives may be used to specify a number of addresses and ports to listen on. The server will respond to requests from any of the listed addresses and ports.
trans-unit.target: 在 Listen 指令告诉服务器仅接受指定的端口或地址和端口的组合上的传入请求。如果在 Listen 指令中仅指定了端口号，则服务器将在所有接口上监听给定的端口。如果提供了IP地址和端口，则服务器将侦听给定的端口和接口。多个 Listen 指令可用于指定要侦听的地址和端口的数量。服务器将响应来自任何列出的地址和端口的请求。

trans-unit.source: The ThreadStackSize directive is used with some platforms to control the stack size.
trans-unit.target: 该 ThreadStackSize 指令用于一些平台来控制堆栈大小。

trans-unit.source: The mod_brotli module provides the BROTLI_COMPRESS output filter that allows output from your server to be compressed using the brotli compression format before being sent to the client over the network. This module uses the Brotli library found at https://github.com/google/brotli.
trans-unit.target: 所述 mod_brotli 模块提供 BROTLI_COMPRESS 输出滤波器，它允许从服务器输出到使用brotli压缩格式通过网络被发送到客户端之前被压缩。该模块使用位于https://github.com/google/brotli的Brotli库。

trans-unit.source: The mod_brotli module sends a Vary: Accept-Encoding HTTP response header to alert proxies that a cached response should be sent only to clients that send the appropriate Accept-Encoding request header. This prevents compressed content from being sent to a client that will not understand it.
trans-unit.target: 所述 mod_brotli 模块发送 Vary: Accept-Encoding HTTP响应报头以警报代理，一个缓存的响应应该被只发送给发送相应的客户机 Accept-Encoding 请求头。这样可以防止将压缩的内容发送给无法理解的客户端。

trans-unit.source: The mod_cache_socache module will only attempt to cache responses that have an explicit content length, or that are small enough to be written in one pass. This is done to allow the mod_cache_disk module to have an opportunity to cache responses larger than those cacheable within mod_cache_socache.
trans-unit.target: 该 mod_cache_socache 模块将只尝试有一个明确的内容长度，或将被写在一个通足够小的缓存响应。这样做是为了使 mod_cache_disk 模块有机会缓存​​比 mod_cache_socache 中可缓存的响应大的响应。

trans-unit.source: The mod_deflate module also provides a filter for decompressing a gzip compressed request body . In order to activate this feature you have to insert the DEFLATE filter into the input filter chain using SetInputFilter or AddInputFilter, for example:
trans-unit.target: 的 mod_deflate 模块模块还提供用于解压缩一个gzip压缩请求主体的过滤器。为了激活此功能，您必须使用 SetInputFilter 或 AddInputFilter 将 DEFLATE 过滤器插入到输入过滤器链中，例如：

trans-unit.source: The mod_deflate module also provides a filter for inflating/uncompressing a gzip compressed response body. In order to activate this feature you have to insert the INFLATE filter into the output filter chain using SetOutputFilter or AddOutputFilter, for example:
trans-unit.target: 的 mod_deflate 模块模块还提供用于膨胀/解压缩一个gzip压缩响应体的过滤器。为了激活此功能，您必须插入 INFLATE 过滤器进入使用输出滤波器链 SetOutputFilter 或 AddOutputFilter ，例如：

trans-unit.source: The mod_deflate module provides the DEFLATE output filter that allows output from your server to be compressed before being sent to the client over the network.
trans-unit.target: 该 mod_deflate 模块模块提供了 DEFLATE 输出过滤器，可以从你的服务器输出通过网络发送到客户端之前进行压缩。

trans-unit.source: The mod_deflate module sends a Vary: Accept-Encoding HTTP response header to alert proxies that a cached response should be sent only to clients that send the appropriate Accept-Encoding request header. This prevents compressed content from being sent to a client that will not understand it.
trans-unit.target: 的 mod_deflate 模块模块发送 Vary: Accept-Encoding HTTP响应报头以警报代理，一个缓存的响应应该被只发送给发送相应的客户机 Accept-Encoding 请求头。这样可以防止将压缩的内容发送给无法理解的客户端。

trans-unit.source: The DumpIOInput directive can help while reviewing the HTTP request to identify issues like the absence of CRLF.
trans-unit.target: 该 DumpIOInput 在审查HTTP请求来识别，如无CRLF的问题指令可以提供帮助。

trans-unit.source: The mod_filter model
trans-unit.target: 该 mod_filter 模型

trans-unit.source: The LogFormat directives %V and %A are useful in conjunction with this module.
trans-unit.target: 所述 LogFormat 指令 %V 和 %A 是与本模块一起有用的。

trans-unit.source: The MultiviewsMatch directive configures whether Apache will consider files that do not have content negotiation meta-information assigned to them when choosing files.
trans-unit.target: 该 MultiviewsMatch 指令配置Apache是否会考虑选择文件时没有分配给他们的内容协商元信息文件。

trans-unit.source: The mod_rewrite module uses a rule-based rewriting engine, based on a PCRE regular-expression parser, to rewrite requested URLs on the fly. By default, mod_rewrite maps a URL to a filesystem path. However, it can also be used to redirect one URL to another URL, or to invoke an internal proxy fetch.
trans-unit.target: 该 mod_rewrite 的模块使用基于规则的重写引擎的基础上，PCRE正则表达式解析器，改写在飞行请求的URL。默认情况下， mod_rewrite 将URL映射到文件系统路径。但是，它也可以用于将一个URL重定向到另一个URL，或调用内部代理获取。

trans-unit.source: The mod_sed input filter reads the data from the next filter in the chain, executes the sed scripts, and returns the generated data to the caller filter in the filter chain.
trans-unit.target: 所述 mod_sed 输入滤波器读取从下一个过滤器中的数据链，执行 sed 的脚本，并将产生的数据返回到所述过滤器链中的呼叫者滤波器。

trans-unit.source: The mod_sed output filter accepts a chunk of data, executes the sed scripts on the data, and generates the output which is passed to the next filter in the chain.
trans-unit.target: 所述 mod_sed 输出过滤器接受数据块，执行 sed 上的数据的脚本，并产生被传送到链中的下一个过滤器的输出。

trans-unit.source: The mod_session_cookie allows the storage of user sessions on the browser within an HTTP cookie.
trans-unit.target: 该 mod_session_cookie 允许用户会话的一个HTTP cookie中的浏览器的存储空间。

trans-unit.source: The mod_session_dbd module allows the storage of user sessions within a SQL database via mod_dbd.
trans-unit.target: 该 mod_session_dbd 模块允许用户会话通过SQL数据库中存储 mod_dbd 。

trans-unit.source: The mod_setenvif module allows you to set internal environment variables according to whether different aspects of the request match regular expressions you specify. These environment variables can be used by other parts of the server to make decisions about actions to be taken, as well as becoming available to CGI scripts and SSI pages.
trans-unit.target: 该 mod_setenvif 模块允许您根据要求的不同方面是否符合指定的正则表达式设置的内部环境变量。服务器的其他部分可以使用这些环境变量来决定要采取的操作，以及可以用于CGI脚本和SSI页面。

trans-unit.source: The StartServers, MinSpareServers, MaxSpareServers, and MaxRequestWorkers regulate how the parent process creates children to serve requests. In general, Apache httpd is very self-regulating, so most sites do not need to adjust these directives from their default values. Sites which need to serve more than 256 simultaneous requests may need to increase MaxRequestWorkers, while sites with limited memory may need to decrease MaxRequestWorkers to keep the server from thrashing (swapping memory to disk and back). More information about tuning process creation is provided in the performance hints documentation.
trans-unit.target: 该 StartServers 的， MinSpareServers ， MaxSpareServers 的，并且 MaxRequestWorkers 调节父进程如何创造儿童服务请求。通常，Apache httpd非常自我调节，因此大多数站点不需要根据其默认值来调整这些指令。需要同时处理256个以上请求的站点可能需要增加 MaxRequestWorkers ，而内存有限的站点可能需要减少 MaxRequestWorkers ,以防止服务器崩溃（将内存交换到磁盘，再换回磁盘）。性能提示文档中提供了有关调优过程创建的更多信息。

trans-unit.source: The StartThreads, MinSpareThreads, MaxSpareThreads, and MaxThreads regulate how the main thread creates worker threads to serve requests. In general, Apache httpd is very self-regulating, so most sites do not need to adjust these directives from their default values. Sites with limited memory may need to decrease MaxThreads to keep the server from thrashing (spawning and terminating idle threads). More information about tuning process creation is provided in the performance hints documentation.
trans-unit.target: 该 StartThreads ， MinSpareThreads ， MaxSpareThreads 和 MaxThreads 调节主线程是如何创建工作线程来服务请求。通常，Apache httpd非常自我调节，因此大多数站点不需要根据其默认值来调整这些指令。内存有限的站点可能需要减少 MaxThreads ,以防止服务器崩溃（生成并终止空闲线程）。性能提示文档中提供了有关调优过程创建的更多信息。

trans-unit.source: The apachectl script is designed to act like a standard SysV init script; it can take the arguments start, restart, and stop and translate them into the appropriate signals to httpd. So you can often simply link apachectl into the appropriate init directory. But be sure to check the exact requirements of your system.
trans-unit.target: 该 apachectl 脚本被设计为像一个标准的SysV初始化脚本;它可以使用参数 start ， restart 和 stop 并将其转换为适当的信号，以传递给 httpd 。因此，您通常可以简单地将 apachectl 链接到适当的init目录中。但是一定要检查系统的确切要求。

trans-unit.source: The AJP13 protocol is packet-oriented. A binary format was presumably chosen over the more readable plain text for reasons of performance. The web server communicates with the servlet container over TCP connections. To cut down on the expensive process of socket creation, the web server will attempt to maintain persistent TCP connections to the servlet container, and to reuse a connection for multiple request/response cycles.
trans-unit.target: 所述 AJP13 协议是面向分组的。出于性能考虑，大概选择了更具可读性的纯文本格式的二进制格式。Web服务器通过TCP连接与Servlet容器进行通信。为了减少昂贵的套接字创建过程，Web服务器将尝试维护与Servlet容器的持久TCP连接，并在多个请求/响应周期中重用连接。

trans-unit.source: The Accept: request header indicates preferences for media types. It can also include 'wildcard' media types, such as "image/*" or "*/*" where the * matches any string. So a request including:
trans-unit.target: 在 Accept: 请求头指明了媒体类型的偏好。它还可以包含“通配符”媒体类型，例如“ image / *”或“ * / *”，其中*匹配任何字符串。因此，请求包括：

trans-unit.source: The AddCharset directive maps the given filename extensions to the specified content charset (the Internet registered name for a given character encoding). charset is the media type's charset parameter for resources with filenames containing extension. This mapping is added to any already in force, overriding any mappings that already exist for the same extension.
trans-unit.target: 该 AddCharset 指令映射给定的文件扩展名指定的内容字符集（互联网注册名称为给定的字符编码）。 charset 是文件类型包含 extension 名的资源的媒体类型的charset参数。该映射将添加到任何已经生效的映射中，从而覆盖同一 extension 已存在的所有映射。

trans-unit.source: The AddCharset directive maps the given filename extensions to the specified content charset (the Internet registered name for a given character encoding). charset is the media type's charset parameter for resources with filenames containing extension. This mapping is added to any already in force, overriding any mappings that already exist for the same extension.

The AddEncoding directive maps the given filename extensions to the specified HTTP content-encoding. encoding is the HTTP content coding to append to the value of the Content-Encoding header field for documents named with the extension. This mapping is added to any already in force, overriding any mappings that already exist for the same extension.
trans-unit.target: 该 AddEncoding 指令映射给定文件扩展名的内容编码指定的HTTP。 encoding 是HTTP内容编码，用于附加到以 extension 命名的文档的Content-Encoding标头字段的值。该映射将添加到任何已经生效的映射中，从而覆盖同一 extension 已存在的所有映射。

trans-unit.source: The AddLanguage directive maps the given filename extension to the specified content language. Files with the filename extension are assigned an HTTP Content-Language value of language-tag corresponding to the language identifiers defined by RFC 3066. This directive overrides any mappings that already exist for the same extension.
trans-unit.target: 该 AddLanguage 指令映射给定的文件扩展名到指定的内容语言。具有文件名 extension 名的文件被分配一个HTTP内容语言值 language-tag ，该值与RFC 3066定义的语言标识符相对应。此伪指令将覆盖该 extension 已经存在的所有映射。

trans-unit.source: The AddOutputFilter directive maps the filename extension extension to the filters which will process responses from the server before they are sent to the client. This is in addition to any filters defined elsewhere, including SetOutputFilter and AddOutputFilterByType directive. This mapping is merged over any already in force, overriding any mappings that already exist for the same extension.
trans-unit.target: 该 AddOutputFilter 指令映射文件扩展名 extension 到过滤器被发送到客户端之前，将处理来自服务器的响应。这是在其他地方定义的所有过滤器的补充，包括 SetOutputFilter 和 AddOutputFilterByType 指令。该映射将合并到所有已生效的映射上，从而覆盖同一 extension 已存在的所有映射。

trans-unit.source: The AddType directive maps the given filename extensions onto the specified content type. media-type is the media type to use for filenames containing extension. This mapping is added to any already in force, overriding any mappings that already exist for the same extension.
trans-unit.target: 在 AddType 指令映射给定的文件扩展名到指定的内容类型。 media-type 是用于包含 extension 的文件名的媒体类型。该映射将添加到任何已经生效的映射中，从而覆盖同一 extension 已存在的所有映射。

trans-unit.source: The Alias directive allows documents to be stored in the local filesystem other than under the DocumentRoot. URLs with a (%-decoded) path beginning with URL-path will be mapped to local files beginning with directory-path. The URL-path is case-sensitive, even on case-insensitive file systems.
trans-unit.target: 该 Alias 指令使文档可以被存储在除下的其他本地文件系统 DocumentRoot 。以（％-decoded）路径以 URL-path path开头的URL将被映射到以 directory-path 开头的本地文件。该 URL-path 是区分大小写的，即使是在不区分大小写的文件系统。

trans-unit.source: The Allow directive affects which hosts can access an area of the server. Access can be controlled by hostname, IP address, IP address range, or by other characteristics of the client request captured in environment variables.
trans-unit.target: 将 Allow 指令影响哪些主机可以访问服务器的一个区域。可以通过主机名，IP地址，IP地址范围或环境变量中捕获的客户端请求的其他特征来控制访问。

trans-unit.source: The AllowCONNECT directive specifies a list of port numbers or ranges to which the proxy CONNECT method may connect. Today's browsers use this method when a https connection is requested and proxy tunneling over HTTP is in effect.
trans-unit.target: 所述 AllowCONNECT 指令指定的端口号或范围的列表，其代理 CONNECT 方法可以连接。当请求 https 连接并且通过HTTP的代理隧道生效时，当今的浏览器使用此方法。

trans-unit.source: The AllowEncodedSlashes directive allows URLs which contain encoded path separators (%2F for / and additionally %5C for \ on accordant systems) to be used in the path info.
trans-unit.target: 所述 AllowEncodedSlashes 指令允许其含有编码路径分隔符的URL（ %2F 为 / 和另外 %5C 为 \ 在路径信息中可以使用一致的系统）。

trans-unit.source: The AuthBasicProvider directive sets which provider is used to authenticate the users for this location. The default file provider is implemented by the mod_authn_file module. Make sure that the chosen provider module is present in the server.
trans-unit.target: 该 AuthBasicProvider 使用指令集，其供应商对这个位置进行身份验证的用户。默认 file 提供程序由 mod_authn_file 模块实现。确保服务器中存在所选的提供程序模块。

trans-unit.source: The AuthDBDUserPWQuery specifies an SQL query to look up a password for a specified user. The user's ID will be passed as a single string parameter when the SQL query is executed. It may be referenced within the query statement using a %s format specifier.
trans-unit.target: 该 AuthDBDUserPWQuery 指定一个SQL查询来查找密码指定用户。执行SQL查询时，用户ID将作为单个字符串参数传递。它可以使用 %s 格式说明符在查询语句中引用。

trans-unit.source: The AuthDBDUserRealmQuery specifies an SQL query to look up a password for a specified user and realm in a digest authentication process. The user's ID and the realm, in that order, will be passed as string parameters when the SQL query is executed. They may be referenced within the query statement using %s format specifiers.
trans-unit.target: 该 AuthDBDUserRealmQuery 指定一个SQL查询来查找密码的摘要式身份验证过程中指定的用户和领域。执行SQL查询时，将按此顺序将用户的ID和领域作为字符串参数传递。可以使用 %s 格式说明符在查询语句中引用它们。

trans-unit.source: The AuthDBMGroupFile directive sets the name of a DBM file containing the list of user groups for user authorization. File-path is the absolute path to the group file.
trans-unit.target: 该 AuthDBMGroupFile 指令集包含用户组的用户权限列表中的DBM文件的名称。 File-path 是组文件的绝对路径。

trans-unit.source: The AuthDBMUserFile directive sets the name of a DBM file containing the list of users and passwords for user authentication. File-path is the absolute path to the user file.
trans-unit.target: 该 AuthDBMUserFile 指令集包含用户名和密码进行用户认证列表中选择一个DBM文件的名称。 File-path 是用户文件的绝对路径。

trans-unit.source: The AuthDigestAlgorithm directive selects the algorithm used to calculate the challenge and response hashes.
trans-unit.target: 该 AuthDigestAlgorithm 指令选择的算法来计算的挑战和响应哈希值。

trans-unit.source: The AuthDigestDomain directive allows you to specify one or more URIs which are in the same protection space (i.e. use the same realm and username/password info). The specified URIs are prefixes; the client will assume that all URIs "below" these are also protected by the same username/password. The URIs may be either absolute URIs (i.e. including a scheme, host, port, etc.) or relative URIs.
trans-unit.target: 该 AuthDigestDomain 指令允许您指定一个或多个URI这是在相同的保护空间（即使用相同的领域和用户名/密码信息）。指定的URI是前缀；客户端将假定所有“以下” URI也受相同的用户名/密码保护。 URI可以是绝对URI（即包括方案，主机，端口等），也可以是相对URI。

trans-unit.source: The AuthDigestNonceLifetime directive controls how long the server nonce is valid. When the client contacts the server using an expired nonce the server will send back a 401 with stale=true. If seconds is greater than 0 then it specifies the amount of time for which the nonce is valid; this should probably never be set to less than 10 seconds. If seconds is less than 0 then the nonce never expires.
trans-unit.target: 该 AuthDigestNonceLifetime 指令控制服务器随机数的有效时间。当客户端使用过期的随机数联系服务器时，服务器将发回 stale=true 的401 。如果 seconds 大于0，则它指定随机数有效的时间；可能永远不应将其设置为少于10秒。如果 seconds 小于0，则随机数永不过期。

trans-unit.source: The AuthDigestProvider directive sets which provider is used to authenticate the users for this location. The default file provider is implemented by the mod_authn_file module. Make sure that the chosen provider module is present in the server.
trans-unit.target: 该 AuthDigestProvider 指令使用指令集，其供应商对这个位置进行身份验证的用户。默认 file 提供程序由 mod_authn_file 模块实现。确保服务器中存在所选的提供程序模块。

trans-unit.source: The AuthDigestQop directive determines the
trans-unit.target: 所述 AuthDigestQop 指令确定

trans-unit.source: The AuthDigestShmemSize directive defines the amount of shared memory, that will be allocated at the server startup for keeping track of clients. Note that the shared memory segment cannot be set less than the space that is necessary for tracking at least one client. This value is dependent on your system. If you want to find out the exact value, you may simply set AuthDigestShmemSize to the value of 0 and read the error message after trying to start the server.
trans-unit.target: 该 AuthDigestShmemSize 指令定义共享内存的数量，这将在服务器启动时被分配用于跟踪客户。请注意，共享内存段的设置不能小于跟踪至少一个客户端所需的空间。此值取决于您的系统。如果要找出确切的值，可以将 AuthDigestShmemSize 设置为 0 ,然后在尝试启动服务器后读取错误消息。

trans-unit.source: The AuthFormProvider directive sets which provider is used to authenticate the users for this location. The default file provider is implemented by the mod_authn_file module. Make sure that the chosen provider module is present in the server.
trans-unit.target: 该 AuthFormProvider 使用指令集，其供应商对这个位置进行身份验证的用户。默认 file 提供程序由 mod_authn_file 模块实现。确保服务器中存在所选的提供程序模块。

trans-unit.source: The AuthGroupFile directive sets the name of a textual file containing the list of user groups for user authorization. File-path is the path to the group file. If it is not absolute, it is treated as relative to the ServerRoot.
trans-unit.target: 该 AuthGroupFile 指令集包含用户组的用户权限列表中的文本文件的名称。 File-path 是组文件的路径。如果不是绝对的，则将其视为相对于 ServerRoot 的相对值。

trans-unit.source: The AuthLDAPCharsetConfig directive sets the location of the language to charset conversion configuration file. File-path is relative to the ServerRoot. This file specifies the list of language extensions to character sets. Most administrators use the provided charset.conv file, which associates common language extensions to character sets.
trans-unit.target: 该 AuthLDAPCharsetConfig 指令设置语言字符集转换配置文件的位置。 File-path 是相对于 ServerRoot 的。该文件指定字符集的语言扩展列表。大多数管理员使用提供的 charset.conv 文件，该文件将公共语言扩展名与字符集相关联。

trans-unit.source: The AuthUserFile directive sets the name of a textual file containing the list of users and passwords for user authentication. File-path is the path to the user file. If it is not absolute, it is treated as relative to the ServerRoot.
trans-unit.target: 该 AuthUserFile 伪指令设置一个包含用户名和密码进行用户认证列表中选择一个文本文件的名称。 File-path 是用户文件的路径。如果不是绝对的，则将其视为相对于 ServerRoot 的相对值。

trans-unit.source: The AuthzDBDQuery specifies an SQL query to run. The purpose of the query depends on the Require directive in effect.
trans-unit.target: 该 AuthzDBDQuery 指定一个SQL查询来运行。查询的目的取决于有效的 Require 指令。

trans-unit.source: The BROTLI_COMPRESS filter is always inserted after RESOURCE filters like PHP or SSI. It never touches internal subrequests.
trans-unit.target: 始终将 BROTLI_COMPRESS 过滤器插入在PHP或SSI之类的RESOURCE过滤器之后。它从不涉及内部子请求。

trans-unit.source: The BrotliAlterETag directive specifies how the ETag hader should be altered when a response is compressed.
trans-unit.target: 该 BrotliAlterETag 指令指定如何当一个响应被压缩ETag的hader应当改变。

trans-unit.source: The BrotliCompressionMaxInputBlock directive specifies the maximum input block size between 16 and 24, with the caveat that larger block sizes require more memory.
trans-unit.target: 所述 BrotliCompressionMaxInputBlock 指令指定16和24之间的最大输入的块大小，需要提醒的是较大的块大小需要更多的存储器。

trans-unit.source: The BrotliCompressionQuality directive specifies the compression quality (a value between 0 and 11). Higher quality values result in better, but also slower compression.
trans-unit.target: 所述 BrotliCompressionQuality 指令指定压缩质量（0和11之间的值）。质量值越高，压缩效果越好，但压缩速度也较慢。

trans-unit.source: The BrotliCompressionWindow directive specifies the brotli sliding compression window size (a value between 10 and 24). Larger window sizes can improve compression quality, but require more memory.
trans-unit.target: 所述 BrotliCompressionWindow 指令指定brotli滑动压缩窗口大小（10和24之间的值）。较大的窗口大小可以提高压缩质量，但需要更多的内存。

trans-unit.source: The BrotliFilterNote directive specifies that a note about compression ratios should be attached to the request. The name of the note is the value specified for the directive. You can use that note for statistical purposes by adding the value to your access log.
trans-unit.target: 所述 BrotliFilterNote 指令指定一个关于压缩比音符应附到该请求。注释的名称是为指令指定的值。通过将值添加到访问日志中，可以将该注释用于统计目的。

trans-unit.source: The BrowserMatch and BrowserMatchNoCase directives are special cases of the SetEnvIf and SetEnvIfNoCase directives. The following two lines have the same effect:
trans-unit.target: 该 BrowserMatch 和 BrowserMatchNoCase 指令是特殊情况 SetEnvIf 之后和 SetEnvIfNoCase 指令。以下两行具有相同的效果：

trans-unit.source: The BrowserMatch is a special cases of the SetEnvIf directive that sets environment variables conditional on the User-Agent HTTP request header. The following two lines have the same effect:
trans-unit.target: 该 BrowserMatch 是一个特殊情况 SetEnvIf 之后指令，设置环境变量在有条件的 User-Agent HTTP请求头。以下两行具有相同的效果：

trans-unit.source: The BrowserMatchNoCase directive is semantically identical to the BrowserMatch directive. However, it provides for case-insensitive matching. For example:
trans-unit.target: 该 BrowserMatchNoCase 指令是语义上等同于 BrowserMatch 指令。但是，它提供不区分大小写的匹配。例如：

trans-unit.source: The BufferedLogs directive causes mod_log_config to store several log entries in memory and write them together to disk, rather than writing them after each request. On some systems, this may result in more efficient disk access and hence higher performance. It may be set only once for the entire server; it cannot be configured per virtual-host.
trans-unit.target: 该 BufferedLogs 指令导致 mod_log_config 存储几个日志条目在内存中，并一起写入到磁盘，而不是每个请求后写他们。在某些系统上，这可能导致更有效的磁盘访问并因此获得更高的性能。整个服务器只能设置一次。不能为每个虚拟主机配置它。

trans-unit.source: The CacheDefaultExpire directive specifies a default time, in seconds, to cache a document if neither an expiry date nor last-modified date are provided with the document. The value specified with the CacheMaxExpire directive does not override this setting.
trans-unit.target: 该 CacheDefaultExpire 指令指定一个默认的时间，以秒计，如果没有到期日也没有最后修改日期设置有文件缓存的文件。用 CacheMaxExpire 指令指定的值不会覆盖此设置。

trans-unit.source: The CacheDirLength directive sets the number of characters for each subdirectory name in the cache hierarchy. It can be used in conjunction with CacheDirLevels to determine the approximate structure of your cache hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 该 CacheDirLength 指令设置在高速缓存层次结构中每个子目录名中的字符数。可以将其与 CacheDirLevels 结合使用以确定缓存层次结构的大致结构。

trans-unit.source: The CacheDirLevels directive sets the number of subdirectory levels in the cache. Cached data will be saved this many directory levels below the CacheRoot directory.
trans-unit.target: 该 CacheDirLevels 指令设置在高速缓存中子目录的级别数。缓存的数据将在 CacheRoot 目录下的许多目录级别保存。

trans-unit.source: The CacheDisable directive instructs mod_cache to not cache urls at or below url-string.
trans-unit.target: 该 CacheDisable 指令指示 mod_cache 的，以不等于或低于缓存的URL url-string 。

trans-unit.source: The CacheEnable directive instructs mod_cache to cache urls at or below url-string. The cache storage manager is specified with the cache_type argument. The CacheEnable directive can alternatively be placed inside either <Location> or <LocationMatch> sections to indicate the content is cacheable. cache_typedisk instructs mod_cache to use the disk based storage manager implemented by mod_cache_disk. cache_typesocache instructs mod_cache to use the shared object cache based storage manager implemented by mod_cache_socache.
trans-unit.target: 该 CacheEnable 指令指示 mod_cache 的缓存网址或低于 url-string 。高速缓存存储管理器由 cache_type 参数指定。也可以将 CacheEnable 指令放置在 <Location> 或 <LocationMatch> 部分中，以指示内容是可缓存的。 cache_type disk 指示 mod_cache 使用 mod_cache_disk 实现的基于磁盘的存储管理器。 cache_type socache 指示 mod_cache 使用由共享库实现的基于共享对象缓存的存储管理器 mod_cache_socache 。

trans-unit.source: The CacheFile directive opens handles to one or more files (given as whitespace separated arguments) and places these handles into the cache at server startup time. Handles to cached files are automatically closed on a server shutdown. When the files have changed on the filesystem, the server should be restarted to re-cache them.
trans-unit.target: 该 CacheFile 指令打开的句柄到一个或多个文件（列为空格分隔参数）和地方这些把手放到缓存在服务器启动时。服务器关闭时，将自动关闭对缓存文件的句柄。文件在文件系统上更改后，应重新启动服务器以重新缓存它们。

trans-unit.source: The CacheLock directive enables the thundering herd lock for the given URL space.
trans-unit.target: 该 CacheLock 指令允许指定网址空间惊群锁。

trans-unit.source: The CacheLockMaxAge directive specifies the maximum age of any cache lock.
trans-unit.target: 该 CacheLockMaxAge 指令指定任何缓存锁的最长期限。

trans-unit.source: The CacheLockPath directive allows you to specify the directory in which the locks are created. By default, the system's temporary folder is used. Locks consist of empty files that only exist for stale URLs in flight, so is significantly less resource intensive than the traditional disk cache.
trans-unit.target: 该 CacheLockPath 指令允许你指定在其中创建锁的目录。默认情况下，使用系统的临时文件夹。锁由空文件组成，这些空文件仅在飞行中的过时URL中存在，因此与传统的磁盘缓存相比，资源占用明显减少。

trans-unit.source: The CacheMaxExpire directive specifies the maximum number of seconds for which cacheable HTTP documents will be retained without checking the origin server. Thus, documents will be out of date at most this number of seconds. This maximum value is enforced even if an expiry date was supplied with the document.
trans-unit.target: 该 CacheMaxExpire 指令指定为其缓存HTTP文件将不检查原始服务器被保留的最大秒数。因此，文档最多将过时此秒数。即使随文档提供了有效期，也会强制执行此最大值。

trans-unit.source: The CacheMaxFileSize directive sets the maximum size, in bytes, for a document to be considered for storage in the cache.
trans-unit.target: 该 CacheMaxFileSize 指令设置的最大大小，以字节为单位来考虑存储在缓存中的文件。

trans-unit.source: The CacheMinExpire directive specifies the minimum number of seconds for which cacheable HTTP documents will be retained without checking the origin server. This is only used if no valid expire time was supplied with the document.
trans-unit.target: 该 CacheMinExpire 指令指定为其缓存HTTP文件将不检查原始服务器保留的最小秒数。仅当文档没有提供有效的到期时间时才使用此选项。

trans-unit.source: The CacheMinFileSize directive sets the minimum size, in bytes, for a document to be considered for storage in the cache.
trans-unit.target: 该 CacheMinFileSize 指令设置的最小大小，以字节为单位来考虑存储在缓存中的文件。

trans-unit.source: The CacheReadSize directive sets the minimum amount of data, in bytes, to be read from the backend before the data is sent to the client. The default of zero causes all data read of any size to be passed downstream to the client immediately as it arrives. Setting this to a higher value causes the disk cache to buffer at least this amount before sending the result to the client. This can improve performance when caching content from a reverse proxy.
trans-unit.target: 所述 CacheReadSize 指令设置数据的最小量，以字节为单位，将被从后端之前的数据被发送到客户端读取。默认值为零，导致所有大小的读取数据在到达时立即立即向下游传递到客户端。将此值设置为较高的值会使磁盘高速缓存在将结果发送到客户端之前至少缓冲此数量。从反向代理缓存内容时，这可以提高性能。

trans-unit.source: The CacheReadTime directive sets the minimum amount of elapsed time that should pass before making an attempt to send data downstream to the client. During the time period, data will be buffered before sending the result to the client. This can improve performance when caching content from a reverse proxy.
trans-unit.target: 该 CacheReadTime 指令设置的经过时间作出的尝试发送到下游客户端的数据前，应经过的最低金额。在这段时间内，数据将被缓冲，然后再将结果发送给客户端。从反向代理缓存内容时，这可以提高性能。

trans-unit.source: The CacheRoot directive defines the name of the directory on the disk to contain cache files. If the mod_cache_disk module has been loaded or compiled in to the Apache server, this directive must be defined. Failing to provide a value for CacheRoot will result in a configuration file processing error. The CacheDirLevels and CacheDirLength directives define the structure of the directories under the specified root directory.
trans-unit.target: 该 CacheRoot 指令定义在磁盘上的目录的名称包含缓存文件。如果 mod_cache_disk 模块已加载或编译到Apache服务器中，则必须定义此伪指令。未能提供 CacheRoot 的值将导致配置文件处理错误。的 CacheDirLevels 和 CacheDirLength 指令定义指定的根目录下的目录的结构。

trans-unit.source: The CacheSocache directive defines the name of the shared object cache implementation to use, followed by optional arguments for that implementation. A number of implementations of shared object caches are available to choose from.
trans-unit.target: 该 CacheSocache 指令定义的共享对象缓存实现对使用的名称，后跟该实施可选参数。甲许多实现共享对象高速缓存的可用选择。

trans-unit.source: The CacheSocacheMaxSize directive sets the maximum size, in bytes, for the combined headers and body of a document to be considered for storage in the cache. The larger the headers that are stored alongside the body, the smaller the body may be.
trans-unit.target: 所述 CacheSocacheMaxSize 指令设置的最大大小，以字节为单位，为一个文件，将合并的标题和正文被考虑存储在缓存中。与主体并排存储的标题越大，主体可能越小。

trans-unit.source: The CacheSocacheMaxTime directive sets the maximum freshness lifetime, in seconds, for a document to be stored in the cache. This value overrides the freshness lifetime defined for the document by the HTTP protocol.
trans-unit.target: 所述 CacheSocacheMaxTime 指令设置的最大新鲜的寿命，单位为秒，对于要存储在高速缓存的文档。此值将覆盖HTTP协议为文档定义的新鲜度生存期。

trans-unit.source: The CacheSocacheMinTime directive sets the amount of seconds beyond the freshness lifetime of the response that the response should be cached for in the shared object cache. If a response is only stored for its freshness lifetime, there will be no opportunity to revalidate the response to make it fresh again.
trans-unit.target: 所述 CacheSocacheMinTime 指令设置，该反应应该在共享对象中的高速缓存被缓存的秒以外的响应的新鲜度寿命量。如果仅在响应的整个生命周期内都存储了响应，则将没有机会重新验证响应以使其再次保持新鲜。

trans-unit.source: The CacheSocacheReadSize directive sets the minimum amount of data, in bytes, to be read from the backend before the data is sent to the client. The default of zero causes all data read of any size to be passed downstream to the client immediately as it arrives. Setting this to a higher value causes the disk cache to buffer at least this amount before sending the result to the client. This can improve performance when caching content from a slow reverse proxy.
trans-unit.target: 所述 CacheSocacheReadSize 指令设置数据的最小量，以字节为单位，将被从后端之前的数据被发送到客户端读取。默认值为零将导致所有大小的读取数据在到达时立即立即向下游传递到客户端。将此值设置为较高的值会使磁盘高速缓存在将结果发送到客户端之前至少缓冲此数量。从慢速反向代理缓存内容时，这可以提高性能。

trans-unit.source: The CacheSocacheReadTime directive sets the minimum amount of elapsed time that should pass before making an attempt to send data downstream to the client. During the time period, data will be buffered before sending the result to the client. This can improve performance when caching content from a reverse proxy.
trans-unit.target: 该 CacheSocacheReadTime 指令设置的经过时间作出的尝试发送到下游客户端的数据前，应经过的最低金额。在这段时间内，数据将被缓冲，然后再将结果发送给客户端。从反向代理缓存内容时，这可以提高性能。

trans-unit.source: The Charset keyword allows you to specify the character set of the generated page. The default is UTF-8 on Windows and Mac OS X, and ISO-8859-1 elsewhere. (It depends on whether the underlying file system uses Unicode filenames or not.)
trans-unit.target: 该 Charset 的关键字允许您指定的字符集生成的页面。在Windows和Mac OS X上，默认值为 UTF-8 ;在其他位置，默认为 ISO-8859-1 。（这取决于基础文件系统是否使用Unicode文件名。）

trans-unit.source: The CharsetDefault directive specifies the charset that content in the associated container should be translated to.
trans-unit.target: 该 CharsetDefault 和指令指定的字符集，在相关容器的内容都应翻译。

trans-unit.source: The CharsetOptions directive configures certain behaviors of mod_charset_lite. Option can be one of
trans-unit.target: 该 CharsetOptions 指令配置的某些行为 mod_charset_lite 。 Option 可以是以下之一

trans-unit.source: The CharsetSourceEnc directive specifies the source charset of files in the associated container.
trans-unit.target: 在 CharsetSourceEnc 指令指定的文件在相关容器中的源字符集。

trans-unit.source: The Content-MD5 header provides an end-to-end message integrity check (MIC) of the entity-body. A proxy or client may check this header for detecting accidental modification of the entity-body in transit. Example header:
trans-unit.target: 所述 Content-MD5 头提供实体-主体的端部到端消息完整性检查（MIC）。代理或客户端可以检查此标头，以检测对运输中的实体的意外修改。标头示例：

trans-unit.source: The CustomLog directive is used to log requests to the server. A log format is specified, and the logging can optionally be made conditional on request characteristics using environment variables.
trans-unit.target: 该 CustomLog 指令用来登录请求到服务器。指定了日志格式，并且可以选择使用环境变量将日志设置为基于请求特征的条件。

trans-unit.source: The DEFLATE filter is always inserted after RESOURCE filters like PHP or SSI. It never touches internal subrequests.
trans-unit.target: 总是将 DEFLATE 过滤器插入在PHP或SSI之类的RESOURCE过滤器之后。它从不涉及内部子请求。

trans-unit.source: The DefaultIcon directive sets the icon to display for files when no specific icon is known, for FancyIndexing. Url-path is a (%-escaped) relative URL to the icon, or a fully qualified remote URL.
trans-unit.target: 该 DefaultIcon 当没有特定的图标是已知的，指令设置要显示的图标为文件 FancyIndexing 。 Url-path 是图标的（％转义）相对URL，或完全合格的远程URL。

trans-unit.source: The DefaultLanguage directive tells Apache that all resources in the directive's scope (e.g., all resources covered by the current <Directory> container) that don't have an explicit language extension (such as .fr or .de as configured by AddLanguage) should be assigned a Content-Language of language-tag. This allows entire directory trees to be marked as containing Dutch content, for instance, without having to rename each file. Note that unlike using extensions to specify languages, DefaultLanguage can only specify a single language.
trans-unit.target: 该 DefaultLanguage 指令告诉Apache，在该指令范围内的所有资源（例如，覆盖当前所有资源 <Directory> 容器）没有明确的语言扩展名（如 .fr 或 .de 作为配置由 AddLanguage ）应分配了content- language-tag 。例如，这允许将整个目录树标记为包含荷兰语内容，而不必重命名每个文件。请注意，与使用扩展名指定语言不同， DefaultLanguage 只能指定一种语言。

trans-unit.source: The DefaultRuntimeDir directive sets the directory in which the server will create various run-time files (shared memory, locks, etc.). If set as a relative path, the full path will be relative to ServerRoot.
trans-unit.target: 该 DefaultRuntimeDir 指令集，服务器将创建不同的运行时文件（共享内存，锁等）的目录。如果设置为相对路径，则完整路径将相对于 ServerRoot 。

trans-unit.source: The DeflateBufferSize directive specifies the size in bytes of the fragments that zlib should compress at one time. If the compressed response size is bigger than the one specified by this directive then httpd will switch to chunked encoding (HTTP header Transfer-Encoding set to Chunked), with the side effect of not setting any Content-Length HTTP header. This is particularly important when httpd works behind reverse caching proxies or when httpd is configured with mod_cache and mod_cache_disk because HTTP responses without any Content-Length header might not be cached.
trans-unit.target: 所述 DeflateBufferSize 指令指定在片段的字节大小，该大小的zlib应在同一时间压缩。如果压缩后的响应大小大于此指令指定的大小，则httpd将切换为分块编码（HTTP标头 Transfer-Encoding 设置为 Chunked ），其副作用是不设置任何 Content-Length HTTP标头。当httpd在反向缓存代理后面工作时，或者在httpd配置有 mod_cache 和 mod_cache_disk 时，这尤其重要，因为可能不会缓存没有任何 Content-Length 标头的HTTP响应。

trans-unit.source: The DeflateCompressionLevel directive specifies what level of compression should be used, the higher the value, the better the compression, but the more CPU time is required to achieve this.
trans-unit.target: 该 DeflateCompressionLevel 指令指定应该用什么级别的压缩，数值越高越好压缩，但更多的CPU时间才能实现这一目标。

trans-unit.source: The DeflateFilterNote directive specifies that a note about compression ratios should be attached to the request. The name of the note is the value specified for the directive. You can use that note for statistical purposes by adding the value to your access log.
trans-unit.target: 所述 DeflateFilterNote 指令指定一个关于压缩比音符应附到该请求。注释的名称是为指令指定的值。通过将值添加到访问日志中，可以将该注释用于统计目的。

trans-unit.source: The DeflateInflateLimitRequestBody directive specifies the maximum size of an inflated request body. If it is unset, LimitRequestBody is applied to the inflated body.
trans-unit.target: 所述 DeflateInflateLimitRequestBody 指令指定的充气请求主体的最大大小。如果未设置，则将 LimitRequestBody 应用于充气后的物体。

trans-unit.source: The DeflateInflateRatioBurst directive specifies the maximum number of times the DeflateInflateRatioLimit can be crossed before terminating the request.
trans-unit.target: 所述 DeflateInflateRatioBurst 指令指定的最大次数的 DeflateInflateRatioLimit 可以终止请求之前交叉。

trans-unit.source: The DeflateInflateRatioLimit directive specifies the maximum ratio of deflated to inflated size of an inflated request body. This ratio is checked as the body is streamed in, and if crossed more than DeflateInflateRatioBurst times, the request will be terminated.
trans-unit.target: DeflateInflateRatioLimit 指令指定膨胀的请求主体的压缩大小与膨胀大小的最大比率。在流式处理正文时检查此比率，如果超过 DeflateInflateRatioBurst 次，则请求将被终止。

trans-unit.source: The DeflateMemLevel directive specifies how much memory should be used by zlib for compression (a value between 1 and 9).
trans-unit.target: 所述 DeflateMemLevel 指令指定多少内存应由ZLIB用于压缩被使用（1和9之间的值）。

trans-unit.source: The DeflateWindowSize directive specifies the zlib compression window size (a value between 1 and 15). Generally, the higher the window size, the higher can the compression ratio be expected.
trans-unit.target: 所述 DeflateWindowSize 指令指定zlib压缩窗口大小（在1和15之间的值）。通常，窗口大小越大，可以预期的压缩率就越高。

trans-unit.source: The DescriptionWidth keyword allows you to specify the width of the description column in characters.
trans-unit.target: 该 DescriptionWidth 关键字允许您指定字符的描述列的宽度。

trans-unit.source: The DirectoryCheckHandler directive determines whether mod_dir should check for directory indexes or add trailing slashes when some other handler has been configured for the current URL. Handlers can be set by directives such as SetHandler or by other modules, such as mod_rewrite during per-directory substitutions.
trans-unit.target: 该 DirectoryCheckHandler 指令确定是否 mod_dir 应检查目录索引或添加结尾的斜杠当一些其它的处理器已经配置了当前的URL。可以通过指令（例如 SetHandler )或其他模块（例如在按目录替换期间使用 mod_rewrite )来设置处理程序。

trans-unit.source: The DirectoryIndex directive sets the list of resources to look for, when the client requests an index of the directory by specifying a / at the end of the directory name. Local-url is the (%-encoded) URL of a document on the server relative to the requested directory; it is usually the name of a file in the directory. Several URLs may be given, in which case the server will return the first one that it finds. If none of the resources exist and the Indexes option is set, the server will generate its own listing of the directory.
trans-unit.target: 该 DirectoryIndex 的指令设置资源的寻找，当客户端通过指定/在目录名的末尾请求目录的索引列表。 Local-url 是服务器上文档相对于请求目录的（％编码）URL；它通常是目录中文件的名称。可能会提供几个URL，在这种情况下，服务器将返回它找到的第一个URL。如果不存在任何资源并且设置了“ Indexes 选项，则服务器将生成其自己的目录列表。

trans-unit.source: The DirectorySlash directive determines whether mod_dir should fixup URLs pointing to a directory or not.
trans-unit.target: 该 DirectorySlash 指令确定是否 mod_dir 应修正内容指向一个目录或不网址。

trans-unit.source: The DocumentRoot should be specified without a trailing slash.
trans-unit.target: 该 DocumentRoot 的应该不带后缀斜线来指定。

trans-unit.source: The ErrorLog directive sets the name of the file to which the server will log any errors it encounters. If the file-path is not absolute then it is assumed to be relative to the ServerRoot.
trans-unit.target: 该 ErrorLog 指令设定的服务器将记录遇到的任何错误的文件名。如果 file-path 不是绝对路径，则假定它是相对于 ServerRoot 的。

trans-unit.source: The Example directive just sets a demonstration flag which the example module's content handler displays. It takes no arguments. If you browse to an URL to which the example-hooks content-handler applies, you will get a display of the routines within the module and how and in what order they were called to service the document request. The effect of this directive one can observe under the point "Example directive declared here: YES/NO".
trans-unit.target: 该 Example 指令只是设置一个演示标记该例子模块的内容处理程序显示器。它没有参数。如果浏览到示例摘录内容处理程序所应用的URL，则将显示该模块中的例程，以及如何以及以什么顺序调用这些例程来满足文档请求。可以在“ Example directive declared here: YES/NO ” 这一点下观察该指令的效果。

trans-unit.source: The ExtFilterDefine directive defines the characteristics of an external filter, including the program to run and its arguments.
trans-unit.target: 所述 ExtFilterDefine 指令定义一个外部滤波器的特性，其中包括要运行的程序和它的参数。

trans-unit.source: The ExtFilterOptions directive specifies special processing options for mod_ext_filter. Option can be one of
trans-unit.target: 该 ExtFilterOptions 指令指定的特殊处理选项 mod_ext_filter 。 Option 可以是以下之一

trans-unit.source: The FileETag directive configures the file attributes that are used to create the ETag (entity tag) response header field when the document is based on a static file. (The ETag value is used in cache management to save network bandwidth.) The FileETag directive allows you to choose which of these -- if any -- should be used. The recognized keywords are:
trans-unit.target: 所述 FileETag 指令配置了用于创建文件属性 ETag 当文档是基于静态文件（实体标签）响应报头字段。（ ETag 值在缓存管理中用于节省网络带宽。） FileETag 指令允许您选择应使用其中的哪一个（如果有）。公认的关键字是：

trans-unit.source: The FollowSymLinks and SymLinksIfOwnerMatchOptions work only in <Directory> sections or .htaccess files.
trans-unit.target: 该 FollowSymLinks 和 SymLinksIfOwnerMatch Options 中只有工作 <Directory> 部分或 .htaccess 文件。

trans-unit.source: The FollowSymLinks and SymLinksIfOwnerMatchOptions work only in <Directory> sections or .htaccess files.
trans-unit.target: 该 FollowSymLinks 和 SymLinksIfOwnerMatch Options 中只有工作 <Directory> 部分或 .htaccess 文件。

trans-unit.source: The ForceLanguagePriority directive uses the given LanguagePriority to satisfy negotiation where the server could otherwise not return a single matching document.
trans-unit.target: 该 ForceLanguagePriority 指令使用给定 LanguagePriority 以满足谈判，其中服务器否则可能无法返回单个匹配文档。

trans-unit.source: The ForensicLog directive is used to log requests to the server for forensic analysis. Each log entry is assigned a unique ID which can be associated with the request using the normal CustomLog directive. mod_log_forensic creates a token called forensic-id, which can be added to the transfer log using the %{forensic-id}n format string.
trans-unit.target: 该 ForensicLog 指令用于登录请求到服务器进行取证分析。每个日志条目都分配有一个唯一的ID，该ID可使用常规的 CustomLog 指令与请求关联。 mod_log_forensic 创建一个名为 forensic-id 的令牌，可以使用 %{forensic-id}n 格式字符串将其添加到传输日志中。

trans-unit.source: The GlobalLog directive defines a log shared by the main server configuration and all defined virtual hosts.
trans-unit.target: 所述 GlobalLog 指令定义由主服务器配置和所有定义的虚拟主机共享的日志。

trans-unit.source: The GlobalLog directive is identical to the CustomLog directive, apart from the following differences:
trans-unit.target: 所述 GlobalLog 指令是相同的 CustomLog 指令，除了以下区别：

trans-unit.source: The GracefulShutdownTimeout specifies how many seconds after receiving a "graceful-stop" signal, a server should continue to run, handling the existing connections.
trans-unit.target: 该 GracefulShutdownTimeout 指定如何收到“优雅停止”信号后多少秒，服务器应继续运行，处理现有的连接。

trans-unit.source: The Group directive sets the group under which the server will answer requests. In order to use this directive, the server must be run initially as root. If you start the server as a non-root user, it will fail to change to the specified group, and will instead continue to run as the group of the original user. Unix-group is one of:
trans-unit.target: 该 Group 指令设置在其下的服务器回答的请求组。为了使用此伪指令，服务器必须首先以 root 身份运行。如果以非root用户身份启动服务器，它将无法更改为指定的组，而是继续以原始用户的组身份运行。 Unix-group 是以下之一：

trans-unit.source: The Header directive may be followed by an additional argument, which may be any of:
trans-unit.target: 所述 Header 的指令之后可以是一个额外的参数，其可以是任何的：

trans-unit.source: The HeaderName directive sets the name of the file that will be inserted at the top of the index listing. Filename is the name of the file to include.
trans-unit.target: 该 HeaderName 指令集，将在指数上市的顶部被插入的文件的名称。 Filename 是要包含的文件的名称。

trans-unit.source: The HeartbeatAddress directive specifies the multicast address to which mod_heartbeat will send status information. This address will usually correspond to a configured HeartbeatListen on a frontend proxy system.
trans-unit.target: 该 HeartbeatAddress 指令指定了多播地址 mod_heartbeat 将发送状态信息。此地址通常将对应于前端代理系统上已配置的 HeartbeatListen 。

trans-unit.source: The HeartbeatListen directive specifies the multicast address on which the server will listen for status information from mod_heartbeat-enabled servers. This address will usually correspond to a configured HeartbeatAddress on an origin server.
trans-unit.target: 该 HeartbeatListen 指令指定哪个服务器将侦听来自状态信息的组播地址 mod_heartbeat -启用服务器。此地址通常将对应于原始服务器上配置的 HeartbeatAddress 。

trans-unit.source: The HeartbeatMaxServers directive specifies the maximum number of servers that will be sending requests to this monitor server. It is used to control the size of the shared memory allocated to store the heartbeat info when mod_slotmem_shm is in use.
trans-unit.target: 该 HeartbeatMaxServers 指令指定将发送请求到该监视器服务器服务器的最大数量。当使用 mod_slotmem_shm 时，它用于控制分配用于存储心跳信息的共享内存的大小。

trans-unit.source: The HeartbeatStorage directive specifies the path to read heartbeat data. This flat-file is used only when mod_slotmem_shm is not loaded.
trans-unit.target: 该 HeartbeatStorage 指令指定读取心跳数据路径。仅当未加载 mod_slotmem_shm 时才使用此平面文件。

trans-unit.source: The HeartbeatStorage directive specifies the path to store heartbeat data. This flat-file is used only when mod_slotmem_shm is not loaded.
trans-unit.target: 该 HeartbeatStorage 指令指定的路径来存储心跳数据。仅当未加载 mod_slotmem_shm 时才使用此平面文件。

trans-unit.source: The INode, MTime, and Size keywords may be prefixed with either + or -, which allow changes to be made to the default setting inherited from a broader scope. Any keyword appearing without such a prefix immediately and completely cancels the inherited setting.
trans-unit.target: 该 INode ， MTime 和 Size 的关键字可与任一前缀 + 或 - ,其允许改变从更广的范围所继承的默认设置进行。任何不带此类前缀的关键字立即出现并完全取消继承的设置。

trans-unit.source: The ImapBase directive sets the default base used in the imagemap files. Its value is overridden by a base directive within the imagemap file. If not present, the base defaults to http://servername/.
trans-unit.target: 该 ImapBase 指令可将默认 base 在图像映射文件中使用。它的值被imagemap文件中的 base 指令覆盖。如果不存在，则 base 默认为 http://servername/ 。

trans-unit.source: The ImapDefault directive sets the default default used in the imagemap files. Its value is overridden by a default directive within the imagemap file. If not present, the default action is nocontent, which means that a 204 No Content is sent to the client. In this case, the client should continue to display the original page.
trans-unit.target: 该 ImapDefault 指令可将默认 default 的图像映射文件中使用。它的值被imagemap文件中的 default 指令覆盖。如果不存在，则 default 操作为 nocontent ，这意味着将向客户端发送 204 No Content 。在这种情况下，客户端应继续显示原始页面。

trans-unit.source: The ImapMenu directive determines the action taken if an imagemap file is called without valid coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 该 ImapMenu 指令确定图像映射文件名为没有有效的坐标所采取的行动。

trans-unit.source: The ImplicitAdd keyword specifies that mod_charset_lite should implicitly insert its filter when the configuration specifies that the character set of content should be translated. If the filter chain is explicitly configured using the AddOutputFilter directive, NoImplicitAdd should be specified so that mod_charset_lite doesn't add its filter.
trans-unit.target: 该 ImplicitAdd 关键字指定 mod_charset_lite 应该含蓄地插入其过滤器时，配置指定的字符集的内容应该翻译。如果过滤器链使用明确配置 AddOutputFilter 指令， NoImplicitAdd 应规定使 mod_charset_lite 不增加它的过滤器。

trans-unit.source: The IndexHeadInsert directive specifies a string to insert in the <head> section of the HTML generated for the index page.
trans-unit.target: 所述 IndexHeadInsert 指令指定的字符串在插入 <head> 的索引页生成的HTML的部分。

trans-unit.source: The IndexIgnore directive adds to the list of files to hide when listing a directory. File is a shell-style wildcard expression or full filename. Multiple IndexIgnore directives add to the list, rather than replacing the list of ignored files. By default, the list contains . (the current directory).
trans-unit.target: 该 IndexIgnore 指令列出目录时增加了文件列表隐藏。 File 是外壳样式的通配符表达式或完整文件名。多个IndexIgnore伪指令添加到列表中，而不是替换被忽略文件的列表。默认情况下，列表包含 . （当前目录）。

trans-unit.source: The IndexIgnoreReset directive removes any files ignored by IndexIgnore otherwise inherited from other configuration sections.
trans-unit.target: 该 IndexIgnoreReset 指令删除被忽略的任何文件 IndexIgnore 从其他配置部分，否则继承。

trans-unit.source: The IndexOptions directive specifies the behavior of the directory indexing. Option can be one of
trans-unit.target: 该 IndexOptions 指令指定的目录索引的行为。 Option 可以是以下之一

trans-unit.source: The IndexOrderDefault directive is used in combination with the FancyIndexing index option. By default, fancyindexed directory listings are displayed in ascending order by filename; the IndexOrderDefault allows you to change this initial display order.
trans-unit.target: 该 IndexOrderDefault 指令与结合使用 FancyIndexing 指数期权。默认情况下，fancyindexed目录列表按文件名升序显示；在 IndexOrderDefault 允许您更改初始显示顺序。

trans-unit.source: The IndexStyleSheet directive sets the name of the file that will be used as the CSS for the index listing.
trans-unit.target: 该 IndexStyleSheet 指令设置将被用作CSS为索引中列出文件的名称。

trans-unit.source: The InputSed directive specifies the sed command to execute on the request data e.g., POST data.
trans-unit.target: 所述 InputSed 指令指定 sed 命令在请求数据，例如，执行 POST 数据。

trans-unit.source: The LanguagePriority sets the precedence of language variants for the case where the client does not express a preference, when handling a Multiviews request. The list of MIME-lang are in order of decreasing preference.
trans-unit.target: 该 LanguagePriority 套，其中处理一个在Multiviews请求时，客户端没有偏好的情况下语言变体的优先级。 MIME-lang 的列表按优先级递减的顺序排列。

trans-unit.source: The Last-Modified header will be respected if already present in a response, and added to the response if the response is a file and the header is missing. The SSILastModified directive takes precedence over XBitHack.
trans-unit.target: 的 Last-Modified 标头将如果已经存在于一个响应的尊重，并添加到响应，如果该响应是一个文件，首标丢失。该 SSILastModified 指令优先于 XBitHack 。

trans-unit.source: The Last-Modified header will be stripped from responses, unless the XBitHack directive is set to full as described below.
trans-unit.target: 的 Last-Modified 标头将来自响应被剥离，除非 XBitHack 指令被设置为 full 如下所述。

trans-unit.source: The LimitRequest* directives are used to place limits on the amount of resources httpd will use in reading requests from clients. By limiting these values, some kinds of denial of service attacks can be mitigated.
trans-unit.target: 该 LimitRequest *指令用于地方限制对资源的httpd的量将在读取来自客户端的请求使用。通过限制这些值，可以减轻某些类型的拒绝服务攻击。

trans-unit.source: The LimitRequestBody directive allows the user to set a limit on the allowed size of an HTTP request message body within the context in which the directive is given (server, per-directory, per-file or per-location). If the client request exceeds that limit, the server will return an error response instead of servicing the request. The size of a normal request message body will vary greatly depending on the nature of the resource and the methods allowed on that resource. CGI scripts typically use the message body for retrieving form information. Implementations of the PUT method will require a value at least as large as any representation that the server wishes to accept for that resource.
trans-unit.target: 所述 LimitRequestBody 指令允许用户设置一个极限上的HTTP请求消息的主体，其中该指令被给予的范围内所允许的大小（服务器，每个目录，每个文件或每个位置）。如果客户端请求超出了该限制，则服务器将返回错误响应，而不是为请求提供服务。正常请求消息正文的大小将根据资源的性质以及该资源允许的方法而有很大的不同。 CGI脚本通常使用消息正文来检索表单信息。 PUT 方法的实现将需要一个至少与服务器希望对该资源接受的表示形式一样大的值。

trans-unit.source: The LimitRequestFieldSize directive allows the server administrator to set the limit on the allowed size of an HTTP request header field. A server needs this value to be large enough to hold any one header field from a normal client request. The size of a normal request header field will vary greatly among different client implementations, often depending upon the extent to which a user has configured their browser to support detailed content negotiation. SPNEGO authentication headers can be up to 12392 bytes.
trans-unit.target: 所述 LimitRequestFieldSize 指令允许服务器管理员设置的限制上的HTTP请求报头字段的允许的大小。服务器需要此值足够大以容纳正常客户端请求中的任何一个标头字段。正常请求标头字段的大小在不同的客户端实现中会大不相同，通常取决于用户将其浏览器配置为支持详细内容协商的程度。 SPNEGO身份验证标头最多可以为12392个字节。

trans-unit.source: The LimitRequestFields directive allows the server administrator to modify the limit on the number of request header fields allowed in an HTTP request. A server needs this value to be larger than the number of fields that a normal client request might include. The number of request header fields used by a client rarely exceeds 20, but this may vary among different client implementations, often depending upon the extent to which a user has configured their browser to support detailed content negotiation. Optional HTTP extensions are often expressed using request header fields.
trans-unit.target: 所述 LimitRequestFields 指令允许服务器管理员来修改允许在HTTP请求的请求首标字段的数量的上限。服务器需要此值大于普通客户端请求可能包含的字段数。客户端使用的请求标头字段的数量很少超过20，但这在不同的客户端实现中可能会有所不同，这通常取决于用户将其浏览器配置为支持详细内容协商的程度。可选的HTTP扩展通常使用请求标头字段表示。

trans-unit.source: The LimitRequestLine directive allows the server administrator to set the limit on the allowed size of a client's HTTP request-line. Since the request-line consists of the HTTP method, URI, and protocol version, the LimitRequestLine directive places a restriction on the length of a request-URI allowed for a request on the server. A server needs this value to be large enough to hold any of its resource names, including any information that might be passed in the query part of a GET request.
trans-unit.target: 该 LimitRequestLine 指令允许服务器管理员设置的限制上的客户端的HTTP请求行的允许的大小。由于请求行由HTTP方法，URI和协议版本组成，因此 LimitRequestLine 指令对服务器上允许请求的请求URI的长度进行了限制。服务器需要此值足够大以容纳其任何资源名称，包括可能在 GET 请求的查询部分传递的任何信息。

trans-unit.source: The Listen directive instructs Apache httpd to listen to only specific IP addresses or ports; by default it responds to requests on all IP interfaces. Listen is now a required directive. If it is not in the config file, the server will fail to start. This is a change from previous versions of Apache httpd.
trans-unit.target: 在 Listen 指令指示的Apache httpd的听只有特定的IP地址或端口; 默认情况下，它响应所有IP接口上的请求。现在， Listen 是必需的指令。如果它不在配置文件中，则服务器将无法启动。这是对Apache httpd以前版本的更改。

trans-unit.source: The Listen directive tells the server to accept incoming requests on the specified port or address-and-port combination. If only a port number is specified, the server listens to the given port on all interfaces. If an IP address is given as well as a port, the server will listen on the given port and interface.
trans-unit.target: 在 Listen 指令告诉服务器接受指定的端口或地址和端口的组合传入的请求。如果仅指定端口号，则服务器在所有接口上侦听给定的端口。如果提供了IP地址和端口，则服务器将侦听给定的端口和接口。

trans-unit.source: The LoadFile directive links in the named object files or libraries when the server is started or restarted; this is used to load additional code which may be required for some module to work. Filename is either an absolute path or relative to ServerRoot.
trans-unit.target: 该 LoadFile 在指定目标文件或服务器启动或重新启动库指令链接; 这用于加载某些模块可能需要的其他代码。文件名是绝对路径或相对于ServerRoot的相对路径。

trans-unit.source: The LoadModule directive links in the object file or library filename and adds the module structure named module to the list of active modules. Module is the name of the external variable of type module in the file, and is listed as the Module Identifier in the module documentation.
trans-unit.target: 该 LoadModule 伪目标文件或库中的指令链接的文件名，并添加一个名为模块结构模块，以积极的模块列表。模块是文件中 module 类型的外部变量的名称，并在模块文档中列为模块标识符。

trans-unit.source: The LogFormat directive can take one of two forms. In the first form, where only one argument is specified, this directive sets the log format which will be used by logs specified in subsequent TransferLog directives. The single argument can specify an explicit format as discussed in the custom log formats section above. Alternatively, it can use a nickname to refer to a log format defined in a previous LogFormat directive as described below.
trans-unit.target: 该 LogFormat 指令可以采取两种形式之一。在第一种形式中，仅指定一个参数，此伪指令设置日志格式，该格式将由后续 TransferLog 伪指令中指定的日志使用。单个参数可以指定一种显式 format 如上面的“ 自定义日志格式”部分所述。或者，它可以使用 nickname 来引用在先前的 LogFormat 指令中定义的日志格式，如下所述。

trans-unit.source: The LogStderr keyword specifies that messages written to standard error by the external filter program will be saved in the Apache error log. NoLogStderr disables this feature.
trans-unit.target: 所述 LogStderr 关键字指定由外部过滤器程序写到标准的错误消息将被保存在Apache的错误日志。 NoLogStderr 禁用此功能。

trans-unit.source: The MMapFile directive maps one or more files (given as whitespace separated arguments) into memory at server startup time. They are automatically unmapped on a server shutdown. When the files have changed on the filesystem at least a HUP or USR1 signal should be send to the server to re-mmap() them.
trans-unit.target: 该 MMapFile 指令将一个或多个文件（列为空格分隔参数）在服务器启动时到内存中。它们会在服务器关闭时自动取消映射。当文件系统上的文件已更改时，至少应将 HUP 或 USR1 信号发送到服务器以重新 mmap() 它们。

trans-unit.source: The MaxConnectionsPerChild directive sets the limit on the number of connections that an individual child server process will handle. After MaxConnectionsPerChild connections, the child process will die. If MaxConnectionsPerChild is 0, then the process will never expire.
trans-unit.target: 该 MaxConnectionsPerChild 指令设置了连接，一个单独的子服务器进程将处理的数量限制。之后 MaxConnectionsPerChild 连接，子进程就会死亡。如果 MaxConnectionsPerChild 为 0 ，则该过程将永不过期。

trans-unit.source: The MaxKeepAliveRequests directive limits the number of requests allowed per connection when KeepAlive is on. If it is set to 0, unlimited requests will be allowed. We recommend that this setting be kept to a high value for maximum server performance.
trans-unit.target: 当启用 KeepAlive 时， MaxKeepAliveRequests 指令限制每个连接允许的请求数。如果将其设置为 0 ，将允许无限制的请求。我们建议将此设置保持较高的值，以实现最佳服务器性能。

trans-unit.source: The MaxMemFree directive sets the maximum number of free Kbytes that every allocator is allowed to hold without calling free(). In threaded MPMs, every thread has its own allocator. When set to zero, the threshold will be set to unlimited.
trans-unit.target: 该 MaxMemFree 指令集，每一个分配器被允许保留，而无需调用的自由字节的最大数量 free() 。在线程MPM中，每个线程都有自己的分配器。设置为零时，阈值将设置为无限制。

trans-unit.source: The MaxRangeOverlaps directive limits the number of overlapping HTTP ranges the server is willing to return to the client. If more overlapping ranges than permitted are requested, the complete resource is returned instead.
trans-unit.target: 所述 MaxRangeOverlaps 指令限制重叠HTTP范围的数目的服务器愿意返回给客户端。如果请求的重叠范围超出允许范围，则返回完整资源。

trans-unit.source: The MaxRangeReversals directive limits the number of HTTP Range reversals the server is willing to return to the client. If more ranges reversals than permitted are requested, the complete resource is returned instead.
trans-unit.target: 该 MaxRangeReversals 指令限制HTTP范围次数正反转服务器愿意返回给客户端。如果请求的范围反转超出允许范围，则返回完整资源。

trans-unit.source: The MaxRanges directive limits the number of HTTP ranges the server is willing to return to the client. If more ranges than permitted are requested, the complete resource is returned instead.
trans-unit.target: 该 MaxRanges 指令限制HTTP的数量范围内的服务器愿意返回给客户端。如果请求的范围超出允许范围，则返回完整资源。

trans-unit.source: The MaxRequestWorkers directive sets the limit on the number of simultaneous requests that will be served. Any connection attempts over the MaxRequestWorkers limit will normally be queued, up to a number based on the ListenBacklog directive. Once a child process is freed at the end of a different request, the connection will then be serviced.
trans-unit.target: 该 MaxRequestWorkers 指令设置了将要服务的并发请求数的限制。通常，超过 MaxRequestWorkers 限制的任何连接尝试都将排队，最多可排队一个基于 ListenBacklog 指令的数目。一旦在另一个请求结束时释放了子进程，则将为连接提供服务。

trans-unit.source: The MaxSpareServers directive sets the desired maximum number of idle child server processes. An idle process is one which is not handling a request. If there are more than MaxSpareServers idle, then the parent process will kill off the excess processes.
trans-unit.target: 该 MaxSpareServers 的指令集所需的最大数量的空闲子服务器进程。空闲进程是不处理请求的进程。如果闲置的 MaxSpareServers 不止一个，那么父进程将杀死多余的进程。
